story:
Julio 26

A 7 DÍAS DE PARTIR

Un gran saludo para todos y una vez más gracias... gracias por soplar al viento para que un par de alas puedan levantarse y hacer volar sueños grandes, mientras un par de pies recorren parajes extraordinarios, mientras la mente crea letras fantásticas para recrear páginas con aventuras.

La aventura va tomando forma, y el camino empieza a atraparte, te vas dejando llevar y tu mente empieza a hacerse a la idea. Recientemente he entendido que ha de ser una mejor opción replantear la ruta, optando por iniciar en Francia, en el camino original. Unos cuantos kilómetros adicionales y uno o dos días más, pero un camino que en el pasado fue también compartido por Carlo Magno, San Francisco de Asis, Paulo Cohelo, entre otras grandes personas... se abre ahora para que yo, también, sea parte de él. He de partir, entonces, en la población de Saint Jean Pied du Port, en Francia, el 2 de agosto temprano en la mañana. Desde allí cruzaré los Pirineos para llegar a Roncesvalles, y desde allí seguir el llamado Camino Francés, rumbo a Santiago, Finisterra y finalmente Muxia.

Más adelante les compartiré otras novedades y avances de este camino que esta a punto de iniciar.

------------------------

July 26th

7 DAYS TO GO

Gigantic greeting to all, and again, thank you… thank you for blowing into the wind, so a couple of wings can rise up and let big dreams fly on, whilst a couple feet walk through extraordinary venues and the mind creates fantastic words to recreate pages with adventures.

This adventure keeps shaping up, and the way begins grabbing you, you let yourself be taken, and your mind sets itself up to the idea. I have recently understood that my way must be rethought of, and I am to take my first steps in France, where the original way actually begins. It’s going to be a few more kilometers, and one or two more days, but a trail that was formerly shared also by Charlemagne, Saint Francis of Assisi, Paulo Cohelo, and many more, is now open for me to be part of it as well. I will begin at the town of Saint Jean Pied du Port, in France, on August 2nd early in the morning, crossing the Pyrenees to reach Roncesvalles and continue on the French Way, to Santiago, Finisterra and finally Muxia.

During the upcoming days I will be sharing more updates on this adventure that is about to begin.

----------------------------------------

Julio 19

PRIMER FASE COMPLETADA!!! :):):)

WWWOOWWWW GENTEEEESSSS!!!!! Millones de gracias a quienes han apoyado esta linda causa divertida.... de verdad qué espectáculo poder contar con ustedes!!! Ahora bien, para que hagamos de este proyecto algo más grande aún, les invito a que subamos la meta a USD 1.000.oo, si llegamos allí adquiriré los elementos necesarios para hacer un segundo libro pero este sólo de fotografías. Un libro de aquellos que pones en la mesa de tu sala y en el que tu ojos se pierden en coloridas páginas.... seguimos empujando... veamos hasta donde crecemos esta aventura!!!!

(La copia física de este segundo libro se venderá con descuento igual al valor de los aportes recibidos en la campaña. Ej. Por un aporte de USD 100.oo recibes el libro gratis; por un aporte de USD 50.oo recibes descuento del 50%...) 

-----------------------

July 19th

PHASE I COMPLETED :):):)

WOWOWOWOWWW PEOPLEEEE!!!!! Thanks thanks thanks a loootttt to all of you who have supported this beautiful and fun cause.... it is really amazing being able to count on you!!! Now, to turn this project into something even bigger, I propose to raise the goal to USD 1,000.oo. If we reach this new limit, I will acquire the elements required to produce a second book, this one just with photographs. This will be one of those books that you lay on your living room table and in which your eyes get lost throughout its colorful pages.... we are to keep rising the bar... let see how much we can grow this fantastic adventure!!!

(The hard copy to this book will be sold with a discount equal to the amount of the donation; i.e. if you donate USD 100.oo you get the book for free; if you donate USD 50.oo you get a 50% discount...)

------------------------------------

EL PROYECTO

Hola!!! y muuuchas gracias por tomarte un instante para permitirme invitarte a esta aventura que quiero compartamos, de cierto modo, juntos.

Como podrás escuchar en el video, el plan que tengo es andar uno de los Caminos de Santiago, el que parte desde Madrid, España, y que recorre unos 828 kilómetros, pasando por la ciudad de Santiago de Compostela y continuando hasta el final del camino, más allá de lo que en algún momento de la historia fuese "El fin del mundo" - Finisterre, y arribando al gran final de este maravilloso viaje que será en un lugar llamado Muxia, donde la tradición invita al peregrino a quemar sus prendas y arrojar las cenizas al océano, como símbolo de renacimiento y purificación.

Mi plan es entonces andar el camino, dejar que las huellas se hagan palabras, y escribir un apasionante libro que ponga las mentes a viajar, a andar, a sentir la energía del planeta entrar por los pies y hacer vibrar el alma.

Para esto me encantaría contar con tu apoyo, saber que unas cuantas sonrisas están disfrutando este andar junto conmigo, y que gracias a ti ha sido posible. Apoyar el plan es sencillo, un donativo que puede ir desde 5 euros hasta lo que desees, y así estarás presente en el viaje y en el libro que publicaré a mi regreso.

Los donativos pueden ser USD 3,oo con lo que me invitarías a una bebida en el camino y cuando la esté disfrutando te enviaré una foto del momento, USD 5,oo y te agradeceré vía Email y en el libro; USD 25,oo y a mi llegada a Santiago compraré una medalla que será bendecida y llevaré conmigo para caminar los últimos 141 kms hasta Muxia, luego la enviaré a tu casa; USD 50,oo para lo anterior más una nota de agradecimiento en una sección especial del libro y una copia digital del mismo una vez publicado; USD 100,oo por lo anterior más envío de la copia física del libro a tu domicilio; USD 300,oo por lo anterior y, en adición, queda a tu disposición el prólogo del libro para que lo escribas tu mismo.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE PROJECT

Hello!!! And thanks a looottt for taking an instant and allow me to invite you into this fantastic journey.

As you might listen on the video, the plan I have is to hike one of the Caminos de Santiago (Way of St. James), starting in Madrid, Spain, and going for about 828 kilometers, passing through the city of Santiago de Compostela, moving on to the once in history “end of the world” – Finisterre, and reaching the grand finale to this marvelous journey at a place called Muxia, where tradition invites to set one’s clothes on fire and throw the ashes into the ocean, as a sign of being reborn and purified.

The plan is, for instance, to hike the trail, have the steps become words, and write a passionate book that will let minds travel, walk, feel the energy of our planet flowing through the feet and boiling up the spirit.

To make this happen, I would love to be able to count with your support, knowing that at some point, some smiles are also enjoying walking along with me and that thanks to you this has been possible. Supporting the plan is simple, we open donations at 5 Euros and up to whatever you feel like, that way you´ll be present within our journey, and in the book I’m publishing on my return.

Donations can be and will receive in return: USD 3,oo to invite me to a drink on the way, I'll surely enjoy it and will send you a pic while at that very moment; USD 5.oo and I will thank you via Email and in the book; USD 25,oo and once I reach the city of Santiago I will buy a medallion, have it blessed and walk it with me for the final 141 kms to Muxia, finally you will receive it at your home so you can keep it; USD 50,oo you’ll get the previous plus a thank you note in a special section of the book, and a digital copy of it once published; USD 100,oo for the previous plus a hard copy of the book sent to your home; finally, for USD 300,oo you’ll have the previous plus you’ll get to write the preface to the book yourself.

Desde allí cruzaré los Pirineos para llegar a Roncesvalles, y desde allí seguir el llamado Camino Francés, rumbo a Santiago, Finisterra y finalmente Muxia.Más adelante les compartiré otras novedades y avances de este camino que esta a punto de iniciar.------------------------July 26th7 DAYS TO GO

thank you for blowing into the wind, so a couple of wings can rise up and let
big dreams fly on, whilst a couple feet walk through extraordinary venues and
the mind creates fantastic words to recreate pages with adventures.

going to be a few more kilometers, and one or two more days, but a trail that

town of Saint Jean Pied du Port, in France, on August 2nd early in
the morning, crossing the Pyrenees to reach Roncesvalles and continue on the
French Way, to Santiago, Finisterra and finally Muxia.

story:
ABOUT WELCOME TABLE PRESS

We are an all-volunteer, independent nonprofit press devoted to publishing & celebrating the essay, in all its forms. CLICK here TO LEARN MORE.

The essay is a chameleon, at once formal and scholarly, lyrical and narrative, personal and political, educational and secretive, humorous and curmudgeonly, loud and quiet. It is endangered and dangerous, adaptable and perishable. Your contributions will help us put bold and provocative literature into the hands of readers, writers, students, and teachers. 

ALL OF THE CONTRIBUTIONS WE RECEIVE COME FROM INDIVIDUALS WHO BELIEVE IN INDEPENDENT PUBLISHING.

HOW YOU CAN HELP SUPPORT OUR WORK

Your support will help build our self-sufficiency (pre-press, printing, and advertising are expensive; the larger the print run, the lower the cost per title; distributing books costs money too).

The more funding we secure, the greater the possibility for us to offer:

  • Discounts for students, teachers, and writers.
  • Handmade limited-edition versions of our titles, whose sales will help futher support our publishing and educational activities.
  • Publishing internships to more students.

Our first Indiegogo campaign, Everywhere Whispering Essays, funded the printing and distribution of our first print title, You. An Anthology of Essays Devoted to the Second Person, edited by Kim Dana Kupperman, with Heather G. Simons and James M. Chesbro.

COMMITTED TO DEMOCRATIC ACCESS

AND EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES

  

Welcome Table Press has published (and distributed at no cost), OCCASIONAL PAPERS ON PRACTICE & FORM, featuring spoken essays derived from talks delivered at symposia, conferences, and other gatherings where friends of the essay might be found. 

                 Click HERE to download FREE PDFs of these important essays. 

Because we are dedicated to spreading the word about the essay, our press has hosted or co-sponsored low-cost or free educational events, including:

  • Two symposia, IN PRAISE OF THE ESSAY: PRACTICE & FORM (cosponsored with Fordham University's Creative Writing Program), and featuring Robert Atwan, Jerald Walker, Vivian Gornick, Phillip Lopate,  Brian Doyle, Lia Purpura, Barbara Hurd, Robin Hemley, Idiots' Books, editors from national periodicals, and many other writers and teachers of the essay.
  • Internships for creative-writing students: we have been working with editorial interns for several years and are currently working with Fairfield University's low-residency MFA Program to provide internships in its publishing concentration.
  • Book arts workshops.
  • Fundraiser readings by the literary touring group Three Genres in the Rain, benefitting organizations devoted to reading and writing.

YOUR CONTRIBUTION IS TAX DEDUCTIBLE. Welcome Table Press was incorporated as a nonprofit organization in 2008 and granted 501(c)(3) status in 2009.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

We know that not everyone can contribute to this fundraising campaign. But here's what you can do:

  • Cook, order, and eat essays everywhere and then make noise about this Indiegogo campaign, via e-mail, social media, on your website or blog, in your community, classes, and at your office.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Buy one of our publications.
  • Consider partnering with us to co-sponsor an event.

MOST IMPORTANTLY: Please purchase our titles--priced well below the cost of producing the physical books-- through our distributor, Itasca Books (and spread the word)*.

To order the YOU Anthology ($20 cover price + 4.50 S&H minimum), please click HERE.

___________________

* Welcome Table Press derives more income per book if you order through ITASCA BOOKS instead of through other distributors or chain bookstores. We’d also love it if you worked with independent and/or college bookstores near you to order our books. If you need a quantity of books for a class, workshop, or other reason please e-mail welcometablepress@gmail.com, let us know what you need, and we will work with you.

story:
Why Geography?

I started geolounge.com to be a geography resource web site.  

Geographic knowledge is fundamental to understanding so many of the current crises in world from the conflict in the Middle East to the Pacific Garbage Patch to why California is undergoing one of the worst droughts in recorded history.  Geographic inquiry is important in solving many of the world's problems, something Dr. John Snow applied to help stop a cholera epidemic in London in 1854.  

My dream is to make geolounge.com a comprehensive resource site for all things relating to geography.  To do this, I need to raise funds to pay for quality reference articles about every subfield of geography.  My vision is to have a freely available repository of high quality, professionally written articles about every field of geography such as biogeography, tourism geography, climatology, water resource management, economic geography, health geography, and cartography (just to name a few).  I would also like to offer articles about case studies to show how geographic knowledge is being applied in real world situations.  

Each article will be a concise and well written reference page to teach readers about a variety of geography topics, written by experts in those speciality areas.  

The Campaign

I am starting this campaign to raise the necessary seed money needed to start hiring academics and professional geographers to craft these resource pages.   Outside of the campaign fees, 100% of funds raised will be used exclusively towards writing projects.  A special page will be set up to list the articles written thanks to this campaign to provide an accounting.  A sponsor page will also be set up to acknowledge all the contributors to this campaign.  

The Impact

Geography education is important.  By offering a freely accessible site all about the field of geography, I hope to offer a meaningful contribution towards geography education.  

I want to take learning about geography outside of the classroom so readers can hear directly from geography professionals about their specialty.  

Other Ways You Can Help

  1. Spread the word about this geography campaign! Use the Indiegogo share tools to share information about this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Google+, and other social media sites.  
  2. If you're on any geography related forums or email distribution lists, share the link and encourage people to visit the campaign and help out.  
  3. Send me your ideas about geography articles you'd like to see published.  You can submit your ideas by clicking here. If you're a geography expert with an article you'd like to write, please contact me via the form as well (make sure to include your contact information).  I'd also love to hear suggestions to make this campaign stronger. 
Thank you for your support!

story:
BRAVE NEW WORLD

www.thebravenewworld.org

what is this all about?

I will be setting on a 3-month learning journey to the West Coast of United States where I believe there is a high concentration of sustainability initiatives imbued with spiritual practices, highly progressive communities and spiritual (r)evolutionaries. As I dive into this learning journey, my purpose is to heal and unleash my creative potential in service of my authentic life calling – to serve the Great Transition – as well as to seek, find and learn from individuals, spiritual teachers, projects and initiatives that are creating the ecological, economical, social and spiritual solutions and healing practices we need in the world today. As I journey, I will capture my learnings, insights, inspirations on my website both in English and Turkish, with prose, poetry, photographs and videos. I will document the teachings, innovation, newness, courage, inspiration…

All I’ll have with myself is a backpack, a computer and a camera.

And of course my questions, my curiosity, my passion for transition stories, evolution and possibility. I will ask these three questions to everyone I will on my journey:

  • what do you see happening in the world right now?

  • how do we become more resilient as individuals and communities as we enter a new era?

  • what role do you play and who do you see yourself becoming in the Great Transition and the creation of an ecologically sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on Earth?


The uniqueness of this story is that it shows how our personal journeys and evolution towards wholeness and authentic life is woven together with the unfolding story of humanity at this time. The story of one woman's seeking and meaning making for her own life becomes the inspiring story of thousands who are healing & co-creating themselves and the world at the same time.


why "Brave New World"?
Because to create a new world, we need a new storyline, we need to believe that it is possible and that it is already happening. By connecting individual and community stories of transformation, healing and resilience, we will strengthen the possibility of co-creating the world we dream of NOW.

What is going on in the World right now has never occurred in human history before. As we complete an era of industrialized, dualistic, ego-based human systems, there seems to be a lot of chaos, destruction and crises out there – from earthquakes to economic collapse, from climate change to social unrest – we seem to be in the middle of a big transition both as humanity and the planet.

But is this all there is to this Story?

The crisis is an opportunity, a wake-up call, an invitation for us to evolve to higher ground. At some point in the evolution process of humanity, we separates ourselves from the rest of Nature, from the natural cycles of Life which created the consequences that we are facing in the form of ecological, economical, social and spiritual crisis right now. This is driving humanity towards creating an ecologically sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on the planet.

How do we shift from a culture & mindset rooted in consumption, greed and control to a culture based on the principles of well-being and sustainability for all of Life?

How do we live authentic lives, doing what we love and putting our gifts into service of life?

This is the greatest story of transition, humanity coming of age in human history. It is the end of the World as we know it and it is the birth of a new reality woven stitch by stitch with the creativity, generosity, compassion and the genius of committed individuals and communities working in solidarity, willing to think and act in a whole new way.

The Shift is already happening and the World needs to know that.

From our individual journeys to our communities' transformation to the planetary shift to the great cycles of Cosmos, we are part of the one Great Story. In the web of Life, everything is connected and related. There is an invitation to tell this amazing story.

The story of the Great Transition and the Birth of a new Humanity.

A leap into the Brave New World.


Envisioned Outcomes

  • Inspiration, encouragement, hope, solutions, insights, joy, possibility, healing, faith, vision by sharing the good news, inspiring stories, successful initiatives

  • An inspiring, informative, weekly updated blog narrating the story of the journey with prose, poetry, photography and video, which is followed by an international audience – with interviews, personal reflections, news of innovative solutions and projects

  • Weekly updates through social media like Facebook & Twitter

  • A book as a collection of blog posts throughout the journey in Turkish/English

  • A Brave New World (BNW) documentary

  • An BNW exhibition

Here are some of the organizations and individuals whose stories I will capture during my journey:

SEATTLE, WASHINGTON

Transition Seattle

http://transitionseattle.ning.com/

Transition Seattle is an alliance of organizations and individuals who believe in living within the limits of the earth's resources, with healthier lifestyles, and in resilient, creative, just, and collaborative communities.


PORTLAND, OREGON

City Repair Project

http://cityrepair.org/

City Repair is an organized group action that educates and inspires communities and individuals to creatively transform the places where they live. City Repair facilitates artistic and ecologically-oriented placemaking through projects that honor the interconnection of human communities and the natural world. CRP's vision is to inspire people to both understand themselves as part of a larger community and fulfill their own creative potential and to activate people to be part of the communities around them, as well as part of the decision-making that shapes the future of their communities.


CALIFORNIA

Penny Livingston-Stark

Regenerative Design Institute http://regenerativedesign.org

The Regenerative Design Institute (RDI) is a non-profit educational organization with the vision that all people can live in a mutually enhancing relationship with the earth.

Penny Livingston-Stark is internationally recognized as a prominent permaculture teacher, designer and speaker.

Bioneers Conference http://www.bioneers.org/

13-17 October 2011

The Bioneers Conference is a leading-edge forum presenting breakthrough solutions for people and planet. The Bioneers Conference is a leading-edge forum where you can see tomorrow today: a future environment of hope. Social and scientific innovators focus on breakthrough solutions inspired by nature and human ingenuity. These visionaries are already creating the healthy, diverse, equitable and beautiful world we want to live in—our legacy for future generations and the web of life on which our lives depend.

Byron Katie

No-Body Intensive: Who Would You Be Without Your Story?

http://www.thework.com


The Work of Byron Katie is a way of identifying and questioning the thoughts that cause all the fear, violence, depression, frustration, and suffering in the world. The No-Body Intensive, a five-day guided exploration of your belief system, lovingly explores and questions the main aspects of identity.

Esalen Institute

http://www.esalen.org/


Esalen is a non-profit organization that has been devoted to the exploration of human potential since the 1960's.

Institute of Noetic Sciences

http://www.noetic.org/


The Institute of Noetic Sciences (IONS) is a nonprofit research and educational organization that conducts, sponsors, and collaborates on leading-edge research into what can be proven scientifically about the nature of reality, often revealing the entangled qualities of mind and body, consciousness and matter.

Global Oneness Project

http://www.globalonenessproject.org

The Global Oneness Project produces films, media and educational materials that explore how the simple notion of interconnectedness can be lived in today's complex world. Since 2006 they've been traveling the world gathering stories that not only question the current paradigm but also reveal our greater human potential.

JeanHouston

Mystery School 2011

http://www.jeanhouston.com

BRAVE
NEW WORLD
www.thebravenewworld.org

what is this all about?


I will be setting on a 3-month learning journey to the 
West Coast of United States where I believe there is a high 
concentration of sustainability initiatives imbued with spiritual 
practices, highly progressive communities and spiritual 
(r)evolutionaries. As I dive into this learning journey, my purpose is 
to heal and unleash my creative potential in service of my authentic 
life calling – to serve the Great Transition – as well as to seek, find 
and learn from individuals, spiritual teachers, projects and initiatives
 that are creating the ecological, economical, social and spiritual 
solutions and healing practices we need in the world today. As I 
journey, I will capture my learnings, insights, inspirations on my 
website both in English and Turkish, with prose, poetry, photographs and
 videos. I will document the teachings, innovation, newness, courage, 
inspiration…

All I’ll have with myself is a backpack, a computer and a camera.

And of course my questions, my curiosity, my passion for
 transition stories, evolution and possibility. I will ask these three 
questions to everyone I will on my journey:



what do you see happening in the world right now?


how do we become more resilient as individuals and communities as we enter a new era?


what role do you play and who do you see yourself 
becoming in the Great Transition and the creation of an ecologically 
sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on 
Earth?




The
uniqueness of this story is that it shows how our personal journeys
and evolution towards wholeness and authentic life is woven together
with the unfolding story of humanity at this time. The story of one
woman's seeking and meaning making for her own life  becomes the
inspiring story of thousands who are healing & co-creating
themselves and the world at the same time. 

why "Brave New World"? Because to create a new world, we
 need a new storyline, we need to believe that it is possible and that 
it is already happening. By connecting individual and community stories 
of transformation, healing and resilience, we will strengthen the 
possibility of co-creating the world we dream of NOW. 
What
is going on in the World right now has never occurred in human
history before. As we complete an era of industrialized, dualistic,
ego-based human systems, there seems to be a lot of chaos,
destruction and crises out there – from earthquakes to economic
collapse, from climate change to social unrest – we seem to be in
the middle of a big transition both as humanity and the planet.  


But
is this all there is to this Story? 


The
crisis is an opportunity, a wake-up call, an invitation for us to
evolve to higher ground. At some point in the evolution process of
humanity, we separates ourselves from the rest of Nature, from the
natural cycles of Life which created the consequences that we are
facing in the form of ecological, economical, social and spiritual
crisis right now. This is driving humanity towards creating an
ecologically sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just
human presence on the planet.
How
do we shift from a culture & mindset rooted in consumption, greed
and control to a culture based on the principles of well-being and
sustainability for all of Life?
How do we live authentic lives, doing what we love and putting our gifts into service of life?

This
is the greatest story of transition, humanity coming of age in human
history. It is the end of the World as we know it and it is the birth
of a new reality woven stitch by stitch with the creativity,
generosity, compassion and the genius of committed individuals and
communities working in solidarity, willing to think and act in a
whole new way.
The
Shift is already happening and the World needs to know that. 


From
our individual journeys to our communities' transformation to the
planetary shift to the great cycles of Cosmos, we are part of the one
Great Story. In the web of Life, everything is connected and related.
There is an invitation to tell this amazing story. 


The
story of the Great Transition and the Birth of a new Humanity.

A
leap into the Brave New World.
Envisioned Outcomes





Inspiration,
	encouragement, hope, solutions, insights, joy, possibility, healing,
	faith, vision by sharing the good news, inspiring stories, successful initiatives




An
	inspiring, informative, weekly updated blog narrating the story of

	followed by an international audience – with interviews, personal
	reflections, news of innovative solutions and projects



Weekly
	updates through social media like Facebook  & Twitter



A

story:
ALLER JUSQU’AU BOUT DE SES RÊVES – En 3 étapes

Après avoir lu quelques uns de mes poèmes et nouvelles, une professeure de français du secondaire m’a un jour dit : «Tu as du talent Geneviève. N’arrêtes jamais d’écrire». En 2007, je terminais le manuscrit de La première femme d’Adam. Pour l’écrire, j’ai laissé mes croquis m’inspirer des allégories imprégnées de constats concernant la confiance en soi, la complémentarité homme/femme, la sexualité et la religion.

Après maintes sessions de débroussaillages et de corrections avec mes proches et connaissances, le document a finalement évolué en une version qui mériterait assurément une édition !

Étape 1 :   Vendre un minimum de 100 exemplaires de La première femme d’Adam

FORMAT

 EURO

CND

Impression

22

28

Ebook

18

22

Étape 2 :   Faire réviser et publier en parallèle La première femme d’Adam avec les services de www.jepublie.com incluant la mise en ligne de mon livre sur les sites jepublie.com et numilog.com, la plus importante librairie numérique française, ainsi que sa distribution auprès de 50 librairies et bibliothèques partenaires (Chapitre.com, Gibert Jeune…)  

SERVICES JEPUBLIE.COM

EURO

CND

Fabrication du fichier intérieur

1250

1 550

Fabrication de la couverture

115

140

Impression de 100 exemplaires

1410

1 750

TOTAL

2775

3 440

+ frais pour campagne de financement de 300 $ = 3740 $

Étape 3 :   Faire parvenir un exemplaire papier ou électronique de La première femme d’Adam à tous ceux qui auront acheté un exemplaire du livre une fois celui-ci édité.

SYNOPSIS

Des interprétations de la mythologie des sumériens, des babyloniens et des écrits hébraïques, dont la Bible, laissent supposer qu’avant Ève, Dieu aurait créé une femme nommée Lilith. Cette dernière, formée d’argile comme son homologue masculin, et par ce fait même, croyant bénéficier d’un statut égal à ce dernier, aurait désiré se placer sur l'homme lors du coït afin d’augmenter son plaisir. Offusqué, Adam s’en serait plaint à Dieu qui aurait exigé de Lilith qu’elle se soumettre à son compagnon. Trop fière et indépendante, Lilith n’y aurait pas consenti et aurait quitté le Paradis pour l’Enfer en emportant avec elle la potentialité de faire diverger le dessein de l’humanité. Car que serait le monde d’aujourd’hui si notre vision de la nature primaire de la femelle humaine était celle d’une femme maîtresse de sa destinée et de sa sexualité, possédant de surcroît un statut égal à celui de l’homme ? C’est sur ce postulat que repose La première femme d’Adam, qui commence là où les textes Saints s’arrêtent. Cette histoire raconte la traversée fictive de Lilith à travers l’Enfer pour regagner sa place au Paradis suite à sa rencontre avec un serpent nommé Igor qui la convainc que cette dernière représente définitivement mieux la femme moderne qu’Ève l’a fait en lui succédant.

 

EXTRAIT no.1

« Il n’y avait que quelques portails qui menaient du Paradis directement en Enfer, et c’est au pied de l’un d’eux que je la trouvai. Elle était recroquevillée sur les braises de l’Enfer comme si ces dernières n’arrivaient pas à réchauffer le froid qu’avaient laissé le rejet et l’abandon dans son cœur.»

 

EXTRAIT no.2

« Après quelque temps de vol, les ailes nous portèrent finalement devant une grande sphère suspendue au néant. Un point blanc apparut sur sa surface et se développa en un grand cercle noir nous indiquant un passage vers l’intérieur.»

 

EXTRAIT no.3

 « Aïv s’avança malaisément dans la pièce puis, au moment où elle voulu offrir ses hommages, elle perdit connaissance en apercevant la scène d’un prédateur dévorant sa proie tissée sur le tapis bordant l’entrée. Alarmée, la reine s’agenouilla auprès d’Aïv et la ventila de ses mains jusqu’à ce que cette dernière retrouve sa lucidité.»

 

EXTRAIT no.4

« Le prince eut une quinte de toux si puissante et si brusque qu’il put à peine reprendre son souffle. Ses soldats accoururent à son chevet pour s’assurer qu’il allait bien, mais ce dernier les repoussa et continua à crier de plus belle.»

story:
LET'S RAISE $19,000!

The Adventures of RECESS SHON - THE CHILDREN'S BOOK

What makes YOU special?  What makes YOU unique?  What is YOUR purpose?

Recess Shon is an "out of the box" fantasy/adventure story about a 10 year old boy named Shon.  Shon is teased by the school's bully because his life revolves around having fun, thus he's given the name RECESS SHON.  What the bully doesn't understand is that Shon has ADHD and that he has a problem focusing for long periods of time.  The need for self worth takes Shon on a journey.  On this journey he realizes that he has a wonderful imagination that propels him and his friends to other worlds where they all realize their individual gifts.  In the end Recess Shon learns to wear the name that was meant for evil as a badge of honor.

What do you want to be when you grow up?  Some children have the answer.  But a lot of kids don't, which makes them feel inferior to the "cool kids."

One of the reasons RECESS SHON is so special is that the readers will have a chance to view LIVE-ACTION episodes online which are called WEBISODES.  In the book there will be unsolved mysteries for which the  kids will create their own story lines.  Kids all across the world will participate and the most CREATIVE concept and/or the BEST story will win a chance to see their idea reenacted in live action.  The footage will THEN be uploaded to the RECESS SHON FAN PAGE with the winner receiving full credit.

"A man that has no imagination has no wings." - Muhammad Ali

THE IMPACT

Just like the "SUPERFRIENDS," EVERYBODY has their own super powers or GIFTS.  RECESS SHON is dedicated to people all across the world of all ages that are searching for their purpose.

I am Michael Flowers, Jr and I AM RECESS SHON.  I often wondered why it was hard for me to focus in class for long periods of time.  I wondered why I hated reading comprehension when I could normally read better than my classmates.  I'm a 70's baby.  Did we even KNOW that there was such a thing as ADHD back then?  I had great parents that believed in me and taught me that all of my dreams and goals were attainable.  I felt empowered and I found my niche.  When a child gains confidence in their uniqueness, their performance in class and their social skills skyrocket. 

When people hear about RECESS SHON, the common question that people have is "What do you think MY gift is?"  Hearing the same question over and over made me understand that I was on the right track.  As long as they're asking the question, I feel confident that I'm reaching them.

In the future, they will say that the story of RECESS SHON was one of their driving forces that helped them achieve and it will be all because of YOU.  

Harry Potter, The Chronicles of Narnia and Lord of The Rings prove that the Fantasy market is a viable market.  Thus, millions of children will flock to RECESS SHON...meaning millions of children will be affected.  All of my projects center around a Spiritual & Social revolution.  My desire is for the reader to see life from a different vantage point.  The vantage point that All Things being possible.

1st Children's Book -------------->  2nd Webisodes -----------------> 3rd Feature Film

Our Mission - To challenge children and adults to evaluate themselves to find their own uniqueness and to celebrate it.

Our Vision - To create a book/webisode and film worthy of a Theatrical release for maximum impact.

How We Plan To Invest Your Generous Gifts

LET'S RAISE $19,000!The Adventures of RECESS SHON - THE CHILDREN'S BOOKWhat makes YOU special?  What makes YOU unique?  What is YOUR purpose?
Recess Shon is an "out of the box" fantasy/adventure story about a 10 year old boy named Shon.  Shon is teased by the school's bully because his life revolves around having fun, thus he's given the name RECESS SHON.  What the bully doesn't understand is that Shon has ADHD and that he has a problem focusing for long periods of time.  The need for self worth takes Shon on a journey.  On this journey he realizes that he has a wonderful imagination that propels him and his friends to other worlds where they all realize their individual gifts.  In the end Recess Shon learns to wear the name that was meant for evil as a badge of honor.
What do you want to be when you grow up?  Some children have the answer.  But a lot of kids don't, which makes them feel inferior to the "cool kids."
One of the reasons RECESS SHON is so special is that the readers will have a chance to view LIVE-ACTION episodes online which are called WEBISODES.  In the book there will be unsolved mysteries for which the  kids will create their own story lines.  Kids all across the world will participate and the most CREATIVE concept and/or the BEST story will win a chance to see their idea reenacted in live action.  The footage will THEN be uploaded to the RECESS SHON FAN PAGE with the winner receiving full credit.
"A man that has no imagination has no wings." - Muhammad AliTHE IMPACT

Just like the "SUPERFRIENDS," EVERYBODY has their own super powers or GIFTS.  RECESS SHON is dedicated to people all across the world of all ages that are searching for their purpose.



I am Michael Flowers, Jr and I AM RECESS SHON.  I often wondered why it was hard for me to focus in class for long periods of time.  I wondered why I hated reading comprehension when I could normally read better than my classmates.  I'm a 70's baby.  Did we even KNOW that there was such a thing as ADHD back then?  I had great parents that believed in me and taught me that all of my dreams and goals were attainable.  I felt empowered and I found my niche.  When a child gains confidence in their uniqueness, their performance in class and their social skills skyrocket. 



When people hear about RECESS SHON, the common question that people have is "What do you think MY gift is?"  Hearing the same question over and over made me understand that I was on the right track.  As long as they're asking the question, I feel confident that I'm reaching them.



In the future, they will say that the story of RECESS SHON was one of their driving forces that helped them achieve and it will be all because of YOU.  



Harry Potter, The Chronicles of Narnia and Lord of The Rings prove that the Fantasy market is a viable market.  Thus, millions of children will flock to RECESS SHON...meaning millions of children will be affected.  All of my projects center around a Spiritual & Social revolution.  My desire is for the reader to see life from a different vantage point.  The vantage point that All Things being possible.

Free Preview of Chapter One: 

Available through my blog, where you can also read about the development of the story and characters.

Project Summary

I want to provide a story that will give a good laugh and explore relatable feelings and experiences, encouraging readers to think deliberately about the way they approach their own lives. I'd like to make a meaningful contribution to the conversation about mental health and this story is the culmination of my efforts. I've completed the story and am seeking support to fund the publishing process, a more detailed breakdown of costs is provided below. By supporting my project, you will receive an opportunity to share a brief message about mental health and the search for happiness as well as support a great local organization in Winnipeg, OPK (Ogijiita Pimatiswin Kinamatwin). Depending on your support level, messages can range from a few sentences to several pages.

Regular Story Summary: A dark satire that unfolds in thoughts of a man struggling to find meaning and happiness in the daily grind of the modern, white-collar work life. A sudden death threat pulls him from his lifeless routine into an unavoidable confrontation with his unhappiness through counselling and the examined life.

The "Abed" Story Summary: It's got the cynical introspection of American Psycho, the existentialism of Fight Club, and the humour of Office Space - only without the murdering, hookers, fighting, and theft. 

Your opportunity: Make a dream come true, share a message with the world, and support a great local organization in Winnipeg that supports the health and well being of at risk indigenous youth and adults - OPK (Ogijiita Pimatiswin Kinamatwin). I will donate 50% of all earnings for 2 years from the date of publication to Action Therapy. Check out the "perks" for additional details about how to share a message.

Where I am at:

I've been sitting on the completed manuscript for two years now and I've decided something must be done. All that is left is review from a professional editor and connecting with distributors. I have chosen to work with a Canadian self-publishing company that will connect me with a professional editor and a large variety of retailers with in-store, ebook, print on demand options. I am hoping friends, family, and kind strangers on the internet will support my goal of raising enough funds to publish!

Funding Breakdown

  • Cover design, layout, and paperback distribution/POD services: 1500
  • Ebook Formatting and distribution: 500
  • Editing: 2,000

Mental Health Theme:

The central struggle in the novel is between the main character and his mental health, an important dialogue for all of us to have. I'm opening up my novel for you to share a thought, experience, or epiphany about mental health and support a great local organization, OPK (Ogijiita Pimatiswin Kinamatwin). I will provide 50% of all profit earned on sales for the 2 years of publication to Action Therapy, a local organization run by a great champion of health and wellness- Mitch Bourbonniere. I had the pleasure of working with Mitch in a practicum placement, I can say that this man cares deeply about the health of his community and the people he supports.

Background:

While pursuing a Masters in Counselling Psychology I found myself taken by the works of Irving Yalom, William Glasser, Viktor Frankl and James Bugental. Particularly the way Irving Yalom would use fiction as a way to explore concepts in mental health and psychotherapy. Happiness is Just a Pill Away is a story that formed as a fun side project while growing my understanding of psychotherapy and sidestepping the responsibilities of a being grad student. 

The novel became a way for me to visualize concepts and dialogue in counselling that resonated with me, specifically ideas surrounding anxiety and meaning in existential psychotherapy. In a funny and exaggerated way, this novel also explores many thoughts I've had about everything from work, relationships, and fluorescent lights through satirical internal dialogue. Written in the first-person perspective, I hope you will become the character and connect with the feelings and thoughts expressed in the story. In the end, I hope the story helps you reframe and manage the your daily experience.

What makes this novel stand out:

I had a few goals when I wrote this story. I wanted it to feel very real, so it is not a wild story about sex, drugs, murder or any of those popular tropes readily available in most movies, shows and books. Instead, I chose to explore an existential crisis that may feel all too familiar for many of us.

The writing style may also stand out. The whole novel takes place in the thoughts and from perspective of the main character. Nothing happens that isn't thought, viewed, or heard through by the main character. I tried to weave a story that pulled you (as the reader) in, letting you become the main character and fully immerse yourself in the fictional world. My initial intent was to create an androgynous character that anyone could identify with, though that didn't work out well in practice...

Risks and challenges

Currently, the challenge I face is funding the publishing process. With the money raised I will have an opportunity to work with a professional editor to polish the final product, receive support from a design team for cover/layout/ebook formatting, and get connected to a distribution network.

My biggest hope is that the story resonates with readers, sparks meaningful introspection, and provides some laughs along the way. It is always a risk to put yourself out there, and writing a story is perhaps one of the most vulnerable processes to go through. 

Thank you for considering supporting my project!

story:
Story of my book

The Anxiety Advantage is an unapologetic perspective on anxiety and more importantly a how to guide on how to manage anxiety as a “Gen Zer” (anyone born between 1995 and 2019) in today's world. Through authentic storytelling paired with scholarly research, The Anxiety Advantage comes together to illustrate how understanding your anxiety can become your biggest superpower.

My name is Wes Woodson and I am the author of The Anxiety Advantage. I wrote this book because I learned that my generation, Generation Z, is the most anxious and depressed generation in history. And after years of struggling with anxiety in silence, I wanted to understand why my generation was so anxious. More specifically, after experiencing the biggest panic attack of my life, going through therapy, and being admitted into a mental health program, I wanted to share all of the tricks I learned as to how to go about managing your anxiety in a better way.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to better manage your anxiety by understanding it better. It is my belief that when we understand the things that makes us anxious and how and why they make us anxious, we gain the biggest advantage over our anxiety. In this book I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for managing anxiety. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you better understand your anxiety.

In this book, you'll learn the reason behind Generation Z's anxiety and the six principles we can adapt in our daily lives to better manage our anxiety. You'll hear stories like:

A young man who was admitted into a mental health institution, but has now managed his anxiety through exercise and keeping a healthy diet.

  • A young woman who hated public speaking, but found an interesting trick to calm her nerves before taking the stage.
  • My personal battle with anxiety and depression and how I have fought to be here today.
  • You will love this book if you are interested in learning more about anxiety, reading personal stories about those who have anxiety, and learning more about self-improvement.


The Anxiety Advantage is a nonfiction book that speaks to Gen Zers and parents of Gen Zers who want to look at anxiety and managing anxiety in a new way.

The Book -The Anxiety Advantage 

The book is divided into 3 parts: What, Why, How.

Part 1: "What" contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. In the first part of the book, we open up to my personal story in order to explain why we are even talking about anxiety in the first place. You travel with me as I go from experiencing the biggest anxiety attack of my life, calling the suicide hotline, and finally checking myself into the hospital. It is my goal that in the first part of this book, you understand both my story and gain insight as to what it can be like when you don't properly understand your anxiety. 


Part 2: "Why" contains chapters 5-7. In the second part of the book, we explore the question of "why is generation z so anxious?". This section includes stories of real individuals who suffer from anxiety attacks due to striving for perfectionism, being afraid of failure, and hyper comparing themselves to their peers through social media, 


Part 3: "How" contains chapters 8-12. In the third and final part of the book, we explore how we can better manage and understand our anxiety. The "how", in terms of tactical advice, is broken into 6 principles. These principles include auditing your current lifestyle, building your support system,  and creating an anxiety playbook. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish in Spring 2021.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

 

The rewards

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Wes Woodson is the founder and chief storyteller of thehidden company; a modern day storytelling company that utilizes the power of storytelling through merchandise and original content to empower Generation Z to be themselves unapologetically. Wes is a national public speaker and has engaged with audiences on topics like mental health, entrepreneurship, and storytelling. Before the age of 21, he served as a public speaker at Tufts University, Babson College, Boston University, and did his own TED Talk.

Despite being an entrepreneur and a speaker, Wes always held a passion for writing and storytelling. It is his hope that through sharing his personal story paired with his unique perspective on anxiety, readers will be encouraged to take part in a larger conversation around mental illness. Ultimately, he desires to use his voice and platform to help end the stigma around having a mental illness.

Besides the business and speaking on stages, Wes is simply a kid at heart. In his spare time, he enjoys reading, binge watching This Is Us, and playing with his malti-poo named Bentley. His friends would describe him as funny, energetic, and kind. They would also include that he is a very picky eater; which explains why he eats the same thing for breakfast everyday (maple and brown sugar oatmeal with two slices of wheat toast and a glass of orange juice...in case you were wondering).

For more information, you can connect with Wes by texting him at 781–917–3554 or following him @weswoodson on all social media platforms.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TheAnxietyAdvantage and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Wes

story:
Story of My Book

She Did That: Stories of Empowerment.

My book is about applauding powerful, inspirational, hardworking women who have dedicated their lives to making positive changes within our society and giving young girls and women a helpful guide on how to follow in their footsteps.

My name is Tia Hudson and I am the author of She Did That: Stories of Empowerment. I wrote this book because I believe that there are too many girls on the planet who doubt their worth and are unable to live their lives to the fullest. This book will empower you to become the best version of yourself and remind you of all the happy aspects of life, according to the experts I have listed. I also feel that positivity is something that has been very overlooked in this age. It’s also a reminder to recognise all of the positivity around you and emphasises the importance of practising it daily.

I hope that, in reading this book, you will discover your inner bad-ass, and recognise that you are capable of making the world more pleasant through such small actions. I hope it gives you the confidence to move mountains, speak up against injustice, and most importantly to believe wholeheartedly in yourself. In this book, I hope to instil the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for female empowerment and positivity in you. And ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you change the world and create a path for your sisters to follow in the hope that one day you can look back proudly on your actions and say ‘I did that!’

In this book, you'll learn about the power of empowering those around you and making your mark in history, including stories on:

Empowerment: Duchess Meghan’s champion method of empowering women worldwide.

Mark In History: How Koffee made a name for herself in the music industry at such a young age and will go down in history because of it!

Find Your Passion: How Lilly Singh’s search for her passion enabled her to build a career in doing what she loves every single day.

You will love this book if you are a feminist and a fan of uplifting the people that surround you, as well as if you require some direction in your life, this book is a source of guidance in that sense.

How to Be a Girl Boss is a non-fiction book that speaks to young girls in high school and young women in university or graduates who are looking at finding their true passion and using their platforms publicly for the first time.

 

The Book - How to Be a Girl Boss

The book is written in 12 different stages and divided into 3 sections.

Part 1 contains the introduction + the first 5 chapters. In these, you will read the stories of women who have had direct experience with setting high ambitions for themselves directly in their line of work and using their name and personal platforms to advocate for social justice. Their methods and thought processes are outlined so that you, too, can learn from their actions. There are additional chapters from the perspectives of doctors and motivational speakers on the topics of self-confidence and positivity.

Part 2 contains the chapters that focus on self-love, finding the fun in everything you do, and the strength we women have when we join forces. These chapters contain the stories that went on to found the MeToo and TimesUp movements, whilst stressing the need to apply self-love to ourselves to prosper within our lives while making it all fun simultaneously! What more could you ask for?!

Part 3 contains the final step of the book along with my closing message. The last step tells the story of Lilly Singh, who has built an incredible career for herself through finding her passion, which was not easy. Finding her passion enabled her to make so many people across the world smile, hence why I felt it was important to save the best until last.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling before publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author

Tia Hudson is in her third year of studying English and American Literature at Royal Holloway, University of London, and works part-time as an estate agent. She became interested in the feminist movement in 2017 and is now a firm supporter of female advancement within western culture.

The motive behind writing this book stems from the influence of strong women in tabloid culture along with the need to encourage young girls to strive for greatness. Tia has described Meghan, Duchess of Sussex as one of her biggest role models. Seeing her incredible work in the field of feminist advocacy allowed Tia to see the role that every girl must play in bringing more awareness to this cause, and creating more harmony in the world. This is what prompted the subject of empowerment and positivity in her book, which she hopes will go on to inspire the minds of many young women, in the way that Meghan has inspired her.

Tia has always had a strong love for writing and has viewed the process of creating this book as a true labour of love, as it combines female advancement and the power of positivity, two concepts that she is deeply passionate about. She has a love for dogs, high-fashion and holistic health and wellness and one day hopes to establish a career in publishing (and run the world as a side hobby!)

For more information you can connect with Tia at tnhudson@hotmail.co.uk and through her various Social Media platforms:
Instagram: @_tiahudson
Facebook: Tia Hudson
LinkedIn: Tia Hudson
Twitter: @tia.hudson27

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #HowToBeAGirlBoss and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Tia Hudson
