story:
Short Summary

Lost In Interpretation is a book about Chinese culture, told by someone who is actually Chinese. While many people can learn to speak Cantonese and Mandarin or study the culture in school, no amount of outside knowledge can contest with being raised in the Chinese culture. This book, based on real stories and events, helps readers gain useful insight into the Chinese culture, US-China relations, Chinese food, language, identities Chinese Americans struggle with, relationships, customs and taboos which many Americans may have found intriguing and fascinating!

My name is Barbara Hong Li and I am the author of Lost In Interpretation. I decided to write this book after I learned of the horrendous murder of Xinran Ji, a USC graduate student from China who was beaten to death with a baseball bat by four teenagers on July 14th, 2014. The surveillance video later showed Ji staggering back to his own fourth floor apartment and eventually dying in his own bed. Although Ji had his cellphone and laptop with him the whole time and a roommate in the next room, he never called for help. The teenagers later admitted that they assumed he had money, simply because he was Chinese. 

Asian Americans are seen as the Model Minority and because of that, they aren't as willing to seek outside help. My own experience of living in the US for the past twenty years has taught me that the understanding many Americans have of China has been shockingly limited. I am writing this book to shatter the misunderstandings, misperceptions, and miscommunications between the two cultures in an effort to reduce the hate crimes against Asian Americans. It is time to demystify the Chinese culture. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that while the American stereotype of the Chinese seems to be one of secrecy and overall rudeness, the truth is that the Chinese and American cultures are actually more similar than one may believe. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for Chinese culture. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand the Chinese culture and people in a fresh new perspective and gain useful insights into the culture that can be be helpful to you either within work settings or on a personal level. 

In this book, you'll learn such things as the Chinese views of marriage, the wrong things to say and do in the Chinese culture, the Chinese way of educating the younger generation to achieve success, the difference between Mandarin and Cantonese, and eight different styles of Chinese cuisines. You'll hear stories such as:

Jingjing, who was a 31-year-old woman with a successful career, but was labeled as a “leftover girl” by her friends and family in China who pressured her into marrying someone almost twice her age. 

Mr. Wong, who stabbed his new wife from China with a pair of scissors when she was in the shower simply because he thought she was making him “wear a green hat,” a figurative way of saying she was cheating on him.

A newly-wedded Chinese wife who arrived in her husband’s house in America ready to assume the role of a housewife, but was viewed as not sexual enough. 

You will love this book if you want to learn more about China from the source, instead of reading yet another second-hand account. Lost in Interpretation is a nonfiction book that speaks to American readers while staying true to what it means to be Chinese.
 

The Book - Lost in Interpretation


The book is written in three parts.

Part 1 contains the Introduction + Chapters 1 - 3. In Part 1, readers will learn how we got here today in terms of US-China relations and the different lenses through which both cultures see the same events. For example, I discuss how many Americans see President Nixon as a criminal and only remember his time in office as scandalous, whereas the Chinese people view him as “the old friend of the Chinese people” and credit him with opening the door to modern US-China relations. Readers will also learn how Chinese Americans, being caught in two different cultures, struggle to find their own identities and their frustration about the difficulties of integrating into mainstream American society. 

Part 2 contains chapters 4 - 16. These start with Hofstede’s six cultural dimensions and the similarities and differences between the Chinese and Americans within them. Readers will learn eight different Chinese cuisines, commonly mispronounced Chinese last names, Chinese family relationships, and the difference between Mandarin and Cantonese. I will also cover Chinese social traditions, such as how we Chinese like to give away “Hong Bao,” which are red envelops containing money. Is that a way the Chinese say “thank you?” or some sort of a bribery? Readers will also learn why dumplings, a favorite for some Americans, are a must-have-item on the dinner table at almost every Chinese festival. 

Part 3 contains chapters 17 and 18. It talks about taboos in the Chinese culture and consequences if wrong things are said or done in the Chinese culture. For example, readers will hear the story of Mr. Wong, who stabbed his new wife from China with a pair of scissors while she was in the shower simply because she put a green towel under his pillow. Readers will also learn the different views regarding life ceremonies, such as how in the US, a memorial ceremony is oftentimes treated as an opportunity to celebrate life. In China, laughter and brightly colored attire are strictly forbidden as such ceremonies are purely an occasion to mourn.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript by December 2021

The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).

You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.
Tier 4: Anything extra will be donated, donation recipient TBD.

About the Author

Barbara Hong Li graduated with an MA in Translation and Interpretation from the School of Translation and Interpretation at Monterey Institute of International Studies (now Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey California). She also has a MS in Training from the University of Leicester, UK and went through a Master’s Degree program in English Linguistics and Applied Linguistics from University of Science and Technology, Beijing. Previously, she was an English lecturer in two Chinese universities, a training manager at China Hotel, National Sales Training Manager of Amway (China) and Senior Administrative Assistant at the US Consulate in Guangzhou, China.

She moved to the US with her family in 2001 and has lived and worked in Los Angeles ever since. She is now a California State Court certified Mandarin and Cantonese Interpreter who works part time for the Los Angeles County Superior Court, a contracted interpreter for the US Federal court and a variety of other US government agencies. She has also taught Legal Translation and Interpretation at UCLA Extension. Barbara’s well-recognized interpretation skills have helped during multiple cases in different courts. She believes in good communication with integrity and accuracy in professional settings as well as on personal levels. She is passionate about promoting empathy and better understanding between people from different cultural backgrounds, including that of US and China, to help reduce misunderstanding, miscommunication and misperceptions.

For more information, you can connect with Barbara Hong Li in the following ways:

www.barbarahongli.com
https://www.facebook.com/barbarahong.li
https://www.instagram.com/barbarahongli/
https://twitter.com/BarbaraHongLi1
https://www.linkedin.com/in/barbara-hong-li-957...

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Use this form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf0BF1... share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit)

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry! 

Please use #LostInInterpretationBook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag: #LostInInterpretationBook
Instagram -https://www.instagram.com/barbarahongli// @newdegreepress
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/barbarahong.li / @NewDegreePress 
Twitter -https://twitter.com/BarbaraHongLi1/ @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Barbara Hong Li

We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.  Other Ways You Can HelpNot everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit)
Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

story:
The Novel

The first draft of The Engineer is complete at 229,000 words - that is about 500 pages in a 6"x 9" book.  It follows the story of Master Engineer Actaeon Rellios in the ruined futuristic city of Redemption, a shattered remnant of the advanced people known only as the Ancients, strewn with dangerous technology, strange creatures, and unforgiving terrain.

In the ruined city, survival is paramount -- politics, war and sustenance rule the minds of most who live there. But Actaeon is different; he is guided by an inquisitive mind and an endless quest for truth. Will these qualities lead him to discover the secrets of Redemption, or will they drive him to the same ruin as the Ancients?

The Engineer is a multi-faceted story that has a bit of something for everyone: science fiction, fantasy, adventure, action, romance, and intrigue.  

The Main Cast

Actaeon: The Engineer himself; a quirky and eccentric former resident of Shore who has journeyed to Pyramid in order to find better opportunities to study the artifacts and solve the mysteries of Redemption.

Eisandre: A young woman that serves as a Knight Arbiter of Pyramid, honor-bound to defend the neutrality of Redemption's political center.

Trench: A mercenary and veteran of the Invasion war, a giant man with a hideous scar across his face.  A brutal fighter that is fiercely loyal to his friends.

Wave: Trench's charismatic best friend and fellow mercenary and veteran.  Wave is one of the best swordsmen in Redemption, a reputation that allows him to cavort with the nobility.

Gunther: The Lord Shore, an older and prominent figure in the Raedelle Dominion who wants to see change in what he sees as the ineffective leadership of his people.

The Author

Darran M. Handshaw is the author of The Engineer - his first novel.  In addition to writing a book, Darran works as an R&D Engineer for Zebra Technologies where he designs and invents new data capture products and holds more than 10 patents.  In his spare time, Darran is also a firefighter and EMT with his local fire department where he recently completed a two-year term as Captain.  When Darran isn't writing, inventing things, or responding to emergencies, he enjoys his time with his wife, Stefanie, and baby son, Corwin.

Read an interview with Darran here: www.bit.ly/darraninterview

The Background

The Engineer is an especially important novel to Darran because it tells the true story of how he met his wife in the text-based, role-playing game Redemption.  The first draft of the novel is complete, and so only the final touches are left before the book can be published for all to read.  The Engineer will be published whether or not the goals of this campaign are achieved, but if you contribute, you can get cool items like:

  • A signed copy of The Engineer.
  • The Engineer's bookmark.
  • Both digital and printed artwork of the cover art and inside map.
  • The Engineer eBook.
  • Recognition in the book as a backer.
  • You could even help the author name one of the characters!

You will also be supporting the project to help fund the final steps in the process to help an author's dream come true.

What's Left

Even though the book has been written, there are quite a few things left to do before it can be published:

  • Cover Art must be commissioned and designed for the book.
  • Final editing must take place for grammar, spelling, and plot consistency.
  • Final touches must be made to the interior map.
  • The book must be formatted for print.
  • The book must be formatted for multiple e-reader formats.
  • The final edited and formatted story must be published.

The Plan

This is where you come in.  With your support, the author will be able to meet the expenses listed below in addition to paying and delivering your backer rewards.  Here's what needs to be done:

  • The cover art will be commissioned from Marcin Rubinkowski, a digital artist whose vision and style matches up nicely with the world of Redemption.  Check out some of his work here:  https://marcinrubinkowski.artstation.com/
    • Cost: $500
  • The book will be formatted for print and e-reader by Streetlight Graphics.  In addition, they will do any final formatting on the cover art for title and back matter.  You can take a look at their website here: http://www.streetlightgraphics.com/
    • Cost: $385
  • Editing will be completed by the author with help from some of his biggest supporters.  This process will take the longest time of all the things that must be done in order to deliver the best possible story to you, the reader.  Because of this, the book may not be ready for publishing until late summer. 
    • Cost: Varies depending on the need for print copies for editors.  Any extra money in this campaign will help fund this effort.
  • The interior map was made by the author as the concept art for Actaeon's map of Redemption.  Final touches will be made to the map by the author so that it is ready for the interior of the final, finished book.
    • Cost: Time.
  • The finished novel will be published using Amazon's Createspace, where Print copies will be available using their Print-on-Demand service and Kindle versions will also be available for the book.  The author also plans on publishing for Nook, Kobo, Apple, Google Play and Smashwords to cover the full variety of e-readers available.
    • Cost: Free + Sale Royalties + Print Costs.

The campaign goal has been set at a reasonable $1,000 to help cover the costs above, in addition to the rewards and editing costs.  Whether or not the goal is met, the plan above will still be completed by the author and any backers will be rewarded once the final work on The Engineer is complete.  If extra money is raised, it will be applied toward advertising the novel to better get the word out.  And, if enough is raised (2-3 thousand more), a professional editor may be hired for the final round of editing to help make the story read even better.

The Rewards

  • The Engineer Desktop Wallpaper:

A high resolution desktop wallpaper of the original cover art for the book.

  • Digital Map:

​A digital copy of the interior map of Redemption, hand drawn by Actaeon Rellios himself!

  • The Engineer eBook for Kindle:

An early release of The Engineer eBook in Kindle format. 

  • Printed Map 8"x10"*:

A large printed version of Actaeon's map of Redemption for the inside of the book.

  • The Engineer's Bookmark*:

A bookmark with art from the cover and promotional artwork so you won't lose your place while you read.

  • Cover Art 11"x14" print*:

A large print version of the original cover art for The Engineer, suitable for framing or use as a poster.

  • The Engineer - Signed Copy*:

​An early release version of the printed paperback novel, individually signed by the author.

  • An in-book Thank You

For major backers of the project, your name will be included inside the book as a thank you for your tremendous support.

  • Help name a character

You will help the author name a character in the book.  The author will discuss your suggestions with you and do his best to find a way to use a name of your suggestion in some form for one of the characters in the book.  The author will have the final say as to the use of the name as it must match the theme and fit the character well.  There are limited characters that are waiting for your help with a name, so get this one right away before they run out!

*All items marked with a (*) will only be shipped within the United States due to high shipping costs for the author to outside countries.  If you live outside of the US, check out the E-Reward Packs!

The Risks

The Engineer will be published regardless of the success of this campaign.  It is a dream of mine to publish a novel and the story has personal meaning to me.  Therefore, you will get your rewards even if the funding goal is not met - though any contribution you make will go a long way toward making this dream come true.

That said, I've set the date for the rewards conservatively as October 2017.  There are many things that can cause a delay in the process, not the least of which being that I've never edited a book before.  I'm shooting for a late summer publishing date, so you may see your rewards even earlier!  I will post any updates to the finalization of The Engineer here, so you will be the first to know (well, second if you count me) how quickly I'm making out and what challenges I run into.

If you have any other questions or concerns, you can feel free to message me on The Engineer's Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ActaeonRellios/  and I'll be sure to get back to you quickly. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any contribution is greatly appreciated, but there are other ways to help out too:

  • Share this campaign to let your own friends know about The Engineer.
  • Let your friends that are fans of science fiction or fantasy fiction know about The Engineer.
  • Follow The Engineer on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ActaeonRellios/
  • Follow Darran M Handshaw on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Engineer7601

Thank you for everything!

-Darran M. Handshaw

story:
I'm a former animator and video game artist that who pursed and fulfilled my lifelong dream of becoming a fine artist painting in oils.  Today, I'm licensed to paint Disney, Star Wars, Warner Bros., The Muppets, Peanuts and more.  However, my own characters, Beau and his Friends Along The Way - they're what I'm really known for ... as well as my collection Places I'd Rather Be.

Throughout the years, Beau has had many adventures, Now it's time for Beau, Red, Ollie, Toothpick and the rest of the gang from my collection Friends Along The Way to bring their adventures to your home on the pages of Friends & Places: The Art Of Rob Kaz.

You know that story in each painting is important to me, so each page of this art book is an opportunity to let you imagine a tale of adventure, friendship or family.

My hardcover book features 160 full-color pages filled with happy art to make you smile! The book includes lots of full-page images and a few stories of special paintings from throughout the years, including stories from you.  As a bonus, never-before-seen paintings are released for the first time in this book.

I'm really excited about sharing my artwork with you in this book and I can't wait to hear what you think!  Thanks for the amazing support throughout the years, my many Friends Along The Way ... and thanks once again for supporting me in Friends & Places: The Art Of Rob Kaz.

A Few Facts

  • The book's Foreword is written by master artist James Coleman!
  • 160 pages
  • hardback book
  • includes a dust cover
  • wrapped in buckram cloth with silver foil on the spine
  • silk pages

"I want people to be happy when they look at my work, so I create stories that personally make me smile or laugh. But I also want people to notice the technical side of my paintings. I put a lot of emphasis on lighting, composition and color when I paint. I think all of these aspects ultimately play a role in determining the emotional outcome of a finished painting." --Rob Kaz

 

A Look Into My Creative Process

See Horse

That Was Fun

Shipping

Books are scheduled to arrive in June 2018 and will ship immediately following the conclusion of this campaign.

Win Prizes For Referrals!

Share using the campaign Share Tools and you could win!

Learn more about Indiegogo's referral program and how it works here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-to-Participate-in-a-Referral-Contest

story:
Short Summary

FlowerSong Books nurtures essential verse from, about, and through the borderlands. The voices of those from Latin America,the U.S,A. and all over the world. We are Literary, Lyrical, Latino, and we welcome allies that understand and join in the voice of people of color and our struggle, truth, and hope.

We will publish novice, emerging, and established writers of short stories and poetry. We are open to submissions all year long and will make it a goal to have a rapid response to every submission. 

We will continue to work with the City of McAllen and the Poet Laureate Anthology Series to publish the voices f the Rio Grande Valley Youth of south Texas. In 2020, we will be publishing Volume 3 in the series.

We will also work with the local community to create free writing workshops for the community by paying authors to create workshop programs.

The money will help pay to create beautiful books by hiring artists that specialize in creating cover art and formatting skills. 

FlowerSong Books Poetry 2020 Forthcoming Authors (so far)

Dreaming: A Tribute To Selena Quintanilla–Pérez, edited by Odilia Galván Rodríguez

the most spectacular mistake you make, by Anatalia Vallez

Huelga, by Jessica Ayala

Ese golpe de luz, by Gabriel González Núñez

Despojo, by Tatiana Figueroa Ramirez

Codex of Love: Bendita ternura, by Liliana Valenzuela

Corta la piel / It Pierces the Skin, by Xánath Caraza

Pearl, by Tom Murphy

Screw The Wall, by Juan Perez

Notes from the Last Age, by José Chapa

No Way To Die, by Dario Beniquez

Yellow Eye Tea, by Diana Elizondo

Border Lust & Brujeria: Cantos Of A Tejano Beat Poet, by Hector Gomez

Driving into Black Mountains, by Sarah Joy Thompson

What We Need & What You Get

We had an aggressive 2019 and don't plan on slowing down. We have our 2020 line-up set and are already looking into 2021 and beyond. Because the money to create all these come from just one source and income it sometimes slows the process. With your help we can continue with this important work and hire some help.

The Impact

The impact can be huge. We are already working with our youth in south Texas by way of the City of McAllen Poet Laureate Anthology Series going on its third year in 2020, and plan on working with Father Gregory Boyle and Homeboy Industries to provide literary workshops to Stand, Heal, and Invest in the Homeboys & Homegirls of Los Angeles. FlowerSong Books looks to spread across the nation and internationally, publishing stories and poetry of border poets across the world.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the news about our campaign.

story:
Discover accurate insights and make astonishing breakthroughs in your career, your finances, your relationships, and most important, in YOURSELF in ways you never have before!

You can have and share The Life By Soul System™ experience as a sponsor of this book project!


Hello!

I'm Grace, and I am the owner, astrologer, numerologist, tarot reader, and blogger for Life By Soul Intuitive Astrology-Numerology-Tarot based in San Jose, CA.  You can learn more about my practice, my blogging/writing, and the philosophy behind it all at http://www.lifebysoul.com

The Life By Soul System™ Book has been over 3 years in the making, and it's finally on a publication track!

The Life By Soul System™ is a unique blending of Western Astrology and Pythagorean Numerology that I have developed over my 20 years of astrology and numerology practitioner experience. It is intended to provide each and all of us with deeper awareness, understanding, acceptance, and respect for ourselves and the people in our lives in ALL areas of our lives - personal/private and professional/public.

These questions and more can finally be answered as they uniquely apply to you:

  • What is my True life purpose and how do I manifest the lifestyle that supports it?
  • What is my money-wealth-abundance pattern?
  • What qualities and characteristics do I really need in a romantic partner?

This first book will provide some fundamental astrology and numerology basics, descriptions of the combinations that are the cornerstone of the system, and step-by-step instructions for you to figure out your Life By Soul base combination and the base combinations of your friends and family.

The Life By Soul System™ is unique because it is the first to actually combine the two practices in a unified form - i.e. Aries 5, Pisces 7, etc.- and to do so with detailed definitions for each of the possible combinations, which the book will provide. The Life By Soul System™ will assist in making both astrological and numerological interpretations easier to do yet also more specific, providing a more in-depth, accurate, and powerful chart interpretation experience for amateurs and professionals both.

Sponsorship pledges come with some great perks, including opportunities for you and others in your life to experience The Life By Soul System™ for yourselves!  As a sponsor for The Life By Soul System™ Book, you could receive:

  • A Family/Group Session – a very comprehensive all-day session that helps get to the root of your family, group, or team dynamics of up to 6 members.  This session is a $450-$540 value. (session to be scheduled before December 31st, 2014)
  • Either a 60-minute or 90-minute Life By Soul System individual session which can be used by you, or your friend or family member. These sessions are a $120-$180 value. (session to be scheduled before December 31st, 2014). 
  • Complementary registration for 2014 Life By Soul events - the first Life By Soul System Chart Interpretation workshop in which you can begin learning how to interpret a natal astrology chart using The Life By Soul System (a $90 value), AND/OR a lecture on Astrology & Numerology and Their Roles in Our Current Times that will discuss current astrological and numerological cycles as well as practical applications for these metaphysical sciences.  The lecture will be offered both in-person and via webcast and/or conference call (a $30+ value).
  • Autographed print copies of the book (hardcover and/or paperback).  There will be extremely limited numbers of each of these initially, so to receive one or more of these might be kind of a big deal. ($40+ value for hardcover, $20+ value for paperback)

ALL sponsorship funds received will go exclusively to the marketing and promotion materials for the book for its optimal reach into astrology and numerology communities and into the general public. These materials will include a promo video, flyers in poster and postcard formats, multimedia marketing support, and additional print copies of the book.  Ideally, $6000 would be raised for this project to be fully funded, though every little bit is appreciated and helps bring the dream of this book getting out into the world closer to reality.

Even if you are not in a position to make a sponsorship donation, please spread the word about the project by sharing the campaign with with people that you know enjoy and/or love astrology and numerology.  Please help me get the word out and about so the book can make it out into the world!


Thank you for your support and encouragement!  It means the world to me!

~ Light, Love, and Blessings,

Grace

story:
A Divinely inspired book of insight that will touch your heart , awaken your mind and heal the world.

-The book also feature's art of a Visonary artist who is quoted as being a divine messnger of Art. Some people are even know to call  him the "God of Painting"!

 

We are living in some truly exciting time's! , where we can truly manifest our heart's desires!

-By the way that was my first video appearance ever ..forgive me as my energy was a little frozen! lol

 

Hello greeting's, Beloved's

For those who don't know who i am, my name is Bernardo Antonacci also known as Enlightened Love on Facebook. Most of you might know me from facebook . I love posting inspirational Love message's all around the world. The video I made above could of been with more enthusiasm and loving energy, people who know me personally, know im full of love and wacky energy, its just that this was my first attempt at making a video it was scary and challenging to say the least. Been Practicing getting better! Sending love to all! 

 

This is a truly exciting Project!!  A timely Project as well! My biggest dream and vision. Let's Co-Create Heaven on Earth Together.

 

 The book is already in the Publishing Process with Hay House (Balboa -Press), it's 90% complete. I just need a final edit and to pay for some extra visionary art in the book and marketing.  There top marketing package's/publicity campaigns can cost anywhere from 4000-15000.The more you help fund the better the marketing package and the more i will be able to reach out and spread this message to the Heart's of the world young and old!

This is what a 6000 dollar publicity campaign consists of 

  • A Personal Publicist to communicate with media on your behalf for a six-week period
  • Professionally written press release, optimized for the Web and distributed to at least 1,000 media outlets carefully chosen based on location, book title, genre and more; recipients could include magazines, newspapers, online publications, and radio and TV programs
  • Recording of a 10- to 15-minute online radio interview, which is aired our weekly Internet radio program, and made available for download on popular sites such as iTunes
  • A copy of the radio for use on your blog, Web site, e-mail or future promotions
  • Six weeks news tracking

 

As i mentioned I'm currently in the self-publishing process with Hay House (Balboa Pess) The Initial Idea was to Title the book 100 ways to live a more Divine Life, but as time progressed ....while I was visiting an ashram I realized the significance of the Divine number 108 (The Buddhists say we have 108 desires to transcend to merge with our buddha nature and most mala's have 108 beads to anchor the mind and after discussing the title change with an established author, I decided to change the title to 108 Ways to live a Divine Life- Rules for a new Humanity. I wanted this book to be easy reading so even a child can read it .....who has time to read those long-drawn-out book's anymore. I really believe that spirituality is meant to be simple ....child like innocence with the wisdom of the heart.

Help me change the world!  Now is the Time!!

 

Exciting time's were living in....The time is Now as Gregg Bradden State's  

"Human beings are waking up to a new understanding about the true nature of our reality. It looks like were going to live through a global paradigm change wonderful time to be alive." -Gregg Bradden

We are entering A New Era of Consciousness. On the same night of the Winter Solstice , the Earth & Heavens will be in a new synchronicity, culminating after 26,000 years of time.

 

 

 

 

Positive: at its highest, this picture/symbol represents vision, creativity and a gift for seeing the world in terms of possibilities and endless opportunities. 

 

 

 

 

Bernardo Antonio Antonacci is originally from Montreal, Quebec ...he has lived in miami, sedona(arizona) and california. He began walking the spiritual path at early age, after reading the book Conversation's with God(Neale Donald walsch)... which changed his life he began a huge spiritual shift. After being inspired from reading book's from author's such as Deepak Chopra and Marianne Williamson. He finally was inspired to be a writer. In his spare time, he likes to travel, write, and paint.

He believes that the blueprint for Heaven is inside all of us and that we all share this role of Divine Love, it's the role that will heal ourselve's and the world.

 

 

I wish for all of us to be creative from our heart center. It will begin to heal us and the world .. All my love..sending love , healing & Blessings! during these transformational times.

With proceeds of the book i want build a love sanctuary/intentional community in nature which all will be welcome. 

 

My biggest dream is to get this book published it has definitely been the most challenging project of my life to say the least. I really struggled mentally with it -the challenge to stay grounded and focused was most difficult. I admit I was to hard on my self when I look back but it's ok im at peace with it now! The're is no doubt there was a deep calling in me to write this book. Thanks to all who helped inspire this project friends ,mystic's ,saints. and to all facebook friends especially and people around the world who spread the message of divine love and oneness. I love you! we are one!

Again -The goal is to share these divine principles to the world and simplify them so that even a child can read and understand them.

 

 

A catalyst to help heal a troubled world. Here are a few enthusiastic and touching endorsements from the book!

*Endorsements

 "Bernardo Antonacci has created a masterful guidebook, a resource and personal blueprint to read, reflect and live by, a journey to unfold. This spiritual map is an invitation to walk along, to bring meaning and purpose to your life. Accessible wisdom spiritual exercises to bring nourishment to the heart and celebrate the resources that inspire self-empowerment. Savor the experiences with wonder and delight 100 practices, ways to live a sacred life." —Dr. Paula Bromberg -Author of The Way Of The Lover. 

 “Remarkable enlightenment.....Bernardo has kept the deepest sense of childlike wonder preserved. I read this magical advise with a constant smile and warm spirit. I found your simplest to profound instructions to live a more divine life sublime. This book should find its self in the hands of every individual around the globe. This book, like the author, reveals love is both noun and verb.” Mishi McCoy- Author “The Lovely Knowing” 

“Your Book touched my heart, overwhelmed me with tears. When truth is spoken it has such impact. Everything you wrote resonated with me lifted my Spirit up with Wings to Fly! A deep thank you for sharing it with us all.” Susanna Isabella www.wingstofly.com.au 

 “Thank you, Bernardo. These simple yet wise words are food for the soul.” Amy Tang, author of A Playdate with Destiny 

Bernardo Antonacci has created a wonderful, heart-touching, and wisdom-filled guide for all of us seeking true happiness. This book has obviously been created from love and sincerity. It shares simple yet profound reminders how we can experience happiness and fulfillment on a deeper soul level. I loved reading every quote, every suggestion, every nuance written to help us remember what is truly valuable in life. The wisdom in this book touched my soul and made me smile. It's filled with love, joy and divine guidance. It feels true - that if we follow these simple suggestions, our lives will be full of joy, grace, and ease. Thank you Bernardo for creating this beautiful guide for us. - Pamala Oslie, Founder of www.LoveColors.com, and author of Life Colors, Love Colors & Make Your Dreams Come True

 There top marketing package can cost anywhere from 4000-10000.

Thank you for reading. Your love donation/energetic exchange is appreciated. Blessings! I look forward to helping you with your creative project's as well. love and light!

 

Everything we do is prompted by the desire to become the inspiration that moves the world.

 

Creation is the product of synchronizing our energy with the universe. Once we experience the whole and recognize it, we become aware that we are nothing but the Divine Creative Force.

 

 ***Please help us spread the word. Post this Project to your facebook, and tell your friends about the book.***Thank-you!

 

The energies of this New Dawning, this Golden Door of enlightenment, invite you to step through the threshold of a new day, and to fully embrace your Divine Christ Light. Freedom comes with owning your Divine Truth. At any moment you choose, you have the free choice to ignite your Divine Spark with Holy Love and Passion. Choose Passion for life, for Love, for creativity... It is time to shine your Love Light, to turn up the flame within your Heart to create Heaven on Earth.-

-Susanna Sophia Hart

story:
Taurin Tales is a shared world anthology about an alien species called the Taurins.  The concept was designed by science fiction writer, editor, and game designer J Alan Erwine.  From there he invited several writers to contribute, and together they formed Taurin Tales.

The authors in the collection will be David Lee Summers, Maggie Bonham, Rick Novy, Tyree Campbell, Ian Brazee-Cannon, Laura Givens, D. Moonfire, and Anna Paradox.

Most of the stories have already been delivered, and we're shooting for a September 1st, 2014 release date.

If Taurin Tales is successfully funded, all contributors will be listed in the back of the book...unless they don't want to be listed...

story:
So, what is No Smoking in the Green Room?

My name is Adam Lopez and I'm an artist manager and artist development specialist, I've done a lot of things in my time in the "music business" and have had a fantastic amount of successes as well as failures.  Being an entrepreneur in such an incredibly difficult industry envokes a lot of different emotions as well as sacrafices.

In No Smoking in the Green Room I touch upon every type of human emotion I felt going through getting me where I am today.  In NSITGR I talk about girlfriends, family, friends, technology, touring, music, college, parties, business and anything else a typical twenty-something may/has run into in an attempt to follow their dreams.

Is this a success story? Yes and No.  Yes, because I'm able to do something I love and am passionate about for a living and No, because being all of 25 years old who knows what the future could hold, but that's what makes it all the better.

Industry professionals speaking about having worked with Adam:

"I admire Adam's ability to tailor a unique strategy for each and every artist he works with.   No two artists are the same, and Adam takes great care to make sure each of his clients is following the best path and strategy for his or her career, personal attentiveness like this is a very special quality to find in a manager.  I've worked with Adam and his artists on a number of live streamed events, first at Stickam.com and currently at YouNow.com.  Live streaming is still a relatively new and evolving arena, and it's been a pleasure experimenting and pushing the boundaries of it with Adam." - Andy Wombwell (Founder of Stickam.com)

"The potential of Adam Lopez is limitless, I've had the pleasure of watching him dominate project after project and really readjust the business model of the music industry" - David Marsh (After Hours Agenda www.afterhoursagenda.com)

"I've had the pleasure of working with Adam on several campaigns and his hard work and dedication is something I truly admire." - Jennifer Appel (CEO/Publicity Director of The Catalyst Publicity Group www.thecatalystpublicitygroup.com)

"My experience with Adam has not only been professional but personal as well.  We've  worked together behind the scenes on projects and also hands on while on tour.  Adam always thinks outside the box and devotes 110% to clients as a manager and friend. He's someone I can trust to turn to for good advice when needed and there's no doubt in my mind he has a great career ahead of him." - Mike Naran (The Ready Set/Ex Sparks the Rescue - www.twitter.com/sparksthemike)

"Adam is one of those guys that you naturally just appreciate. He has an uncanny ability to comprehend your pain, your hunger, your struggle, internalize it and morph it into a creative opportunity. I've had the privilege of working with Adam not just as a manager, but as a co-writer, producer and mentor as well. His understanding of the music industry is not only in the business aspect but down to the finer points of song and artist development are unmatched by most." -  Deanero (Writer/Producer www.deanero.com)

"Working with Adam Lopez has been one of the most rewarding experiences of my journalism career. I've been working with musicians, industry professionals and the general public for four years and never have I experienced someone with such passion as Adam. His drive and enthusiasm are what separates him from the rest of the people in the industry. Along with his incredible work ethic, his ability to connect with people is astounding. Adam is the kind of person who wants to see you succeed. He will go above and beyond the call of duty to ensure things are done well. I don't think there's a limit to Adam's abilities or dreams. His unique insights into the way of the world are built by experience and an open mind. This is just the start of the great career Adam has started to build." - Cat Hill (Journalist (www.pupfresh.com)

"Adam and I have partnered on a range of projects including promotional spotlights, music videos and documentaries - many of which have helped to greatly advance the careers of our co-collaborators. Adam brings a sense of creative and pragmatic direction to his work as well as valuable industry insight. He consistently sets his sights on raising the bar of the material that he produces, and the artists and organizations that he represents." - Nicholas Forte (Film Director, Fortissimo Films www.nicholasforte.com) 

Here's where you come in!

No Smoking in the Green Room has been a passion project of mine for the past three years, No Smoking in the Green Room has been written through an array of voice memos, iPhone notes, bar napkins, college notebooks and everything in between. I'm incredibly excited to be putting all of that together to create a fun, witty, but also (somewhat) informational book that every person in any industry or age group will be able to appreciate and enjoy!

I've worked on a fair amount of crowd funding projects for artists I've handled over the years and I figured what better place to bring my passion project to life then to utilize a crowd funding site!  This campagn is not so much for financial reasons as it is to get everyone involved!

Writing a book takes years material and hundreds of hours of writing along with countless dedication and emotion, so needless to say the hard part is done!  Now, I want to bring it to you guys!  

All the money raised from this campaign will be put towards editing, duplicaton, formatting, deisgn and all those other little things that it takes to get No Smoking in the Green Room into your hands! 

The Impact!

With your help I hope to get this passion project out to as many people as possible (including you!) so every dollar helps.  I look forward to providing people of all walks of life and maybe even other young entrepenuers some great advice, anecdotes and just good (sometimes) clean fun!

Let's Get Social!

Even if you don't have a dime to donate, that's completely fine!  A simple Tweet or Facebook share is just as helpful, also, feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools on this page to help spread the word!

Projects and other ventures Adam has taken part in:

Founder:

New Age Media Management - Talent Management Firm (Est. 2010)

Fans For Cans - Music based charity, to help engage the youth to help feed the needy (Est. 2009)

BLK Limited - Independent merchandise distribution firm (Launching: August 2013)

story_txt:
So, what is No Smoking in the Green Room?
My name is Adam Lopez and I'm an artist manager and artist development specialist, I've done a lot of things in my time in the "music business" and have had a fantastic amount of successes as well as failures.  Being an entrepreneur in such an incredibly difficult industry envokes a lot of different emotions as well as sacrafices.
In No Smoking in the Green Room I touch upon every type of human emotion I felt going through getting me where I am today.  In NSITGR I talk about girlfriends, family, friends, technology, touring, music, college, parties, business and anything else a typical twenty-something may/has run into in an attempt to follow their dreams.
Is this a success story? Yes and No.  Yes, because I'm able to do something I love and am passionate about for a living and No, because being all of 25 years old who knows what the future could hold, but that's what makes it all the better.
Industry professionals speaking about having worked with Adam:
"I admire Adam's ability to tailor a unique strategy for each and every artist he works with.   No two artists are the same, and Adam takes great care to make sure each of his clients is following the best path and strategy for his or her career, personal attentiveness like this is a very special quality to find in a manager.  I've worked with Adam and his artists on a number of live streamed events, first at Stickam.com and currently at YouNow.com.  Live streaming is still a relatively new and evolving arena, and it's been a pleasure experimenting and pushing the boundaries of it with Adam." - Andy Wombwell (Founder of Stickam.com)
"The potential of Adam Lopez is limitless, I've had the pleasure of watching him dominate project after project and really readjust the business model of the music industry" - David Marsh (After Hours Agenda www.afterhoursagenda.com)
"I've had the pleasure of working with Adam on several campaigns and his hard work and dedication is something I truly admire." - Jennifer Appel (CEO/Publicity Director of The Catalyst Publicity Group www.thecatalystpublicitygroup.com)
"My experience with Adam has not only been professional but personal as well.  We've  worked together behind the scenes on projects and also hands on while on tour.  Adam always thinks outside the box and devotes 110% to clients as a manager and friend. He's someone I can trust to turn to for good advice when needed and there's no doubt in my mind he has a great career ahead of him." - Mike Naran (The Ready Set/Ex Sparks the Rescue - www.twitter.com/sparksthemike)
"Adam is one of those guys that you naturally just appreciate. He has an uncanny ability to comprehend your pain, your hunger, your struggle, internalize it and morph it into a creative opportunity. I've had the privilege of working with Adam not just as a manager, but as a co-writer, producer and mentor as well. His understanding of the music industry is not only in the business aspect but down to the finer points of song and artist development are unmatched by most." -  Deanero (Writer/Producer www.deanero.com)
"Working with Adam Lopez has been one of the most rewarding experiences of my journalism career. I've been working with musicians, industry professionals and the general public for four years and never have I experienced someone with such passion as Adam. His drive and enthusiasm are what separates him from the rest of the people in the industry. Along with his incredible work ethic, his ability to connect with people is astounding. Adam is the kind of person who wants to see you succeed. He will go above and beyond the call of duty to ensure things are done well. I don't think there's a limit to Adam's abilities or dreams. His unique insights into the way of the world are built by experience and an open mind. This is just the start of the great career Adam has started to build." - Cat Hill (Journalist (www.pupfresh.com)
"Adam and I have partnered on a range of projects including promotional spotlights, music videos and documentaries - many of which have helped to greatly advance the careers of our co-collaborators. Adam brings a sense of creative and pragmatic direction to his work as well as valuable industry insight. He consistently sets his sights on raising the bar of the material that he produces, and the artists and organizations that he represents." - Nicholas Forte (Film Director, Fortissimo Films www.nicholasforte.com) 
Here's where you come in!
No Smoking in the Green Room has been a passion project of mine for the past three years, No Smoking in the Green Room has been written through an array of voice memos, iPhone notes, bar napkins, college notebooks and everything in between. I'm incredibly excited to be putting all of that together to create a fun, witty, but also (somewhat) informational book that every person in any industry or age group will be able to appreciate and enjoy!
I've worked on a fair amount of crowd funding projects for artists I've handled over the years and I figured what better place to bring my passion project to life then to utilize a crowd funding site!  This campagn is not so much for financial reasons as it is to get everyone involved!
Writing a book takes years material and hundreds of hours of writing along with countless dedication and emotion, so needless to say the hard part is done!  Now, I want to bring it to you guys!  
All the money raised from this campaign will be put towards editing, duplicaton, formatting, deisgn and all those other little things that it takes to get No Smoking in the Green Room into your hands! 


The Impact!
With your help I hope to get this passion project out to as many people as possible (including you!) so every dollar helps.  I look forward to providing people of all walks of life and maybe even other young entrepenuers some great advice, anecdotes and just good (sometimes) clean fun!


Let's Get Social!
Even if you don't have a dime to donate, that's completely fine!  A simple Tweet or Facebook share is just as helpful, also, feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools on this page to help spread the word!

story:
Un web journal fondato da studenti universitari

Studionews24 è un periodico online indipendente che non riceve finanziamento pubblico. Il portale ha visto la luce nel novembre 2011, è stato creato due giovani studenti con la passione del web-design e del giornalismo. I due studenti hanno coinvolto i loro amici nel progetto e ad oggi contiamo una redazione di 16 ottimi autori, attualmente tutti sotto i 25 anni. Abbiamo deciso di portare avanti un progetto che potesse abbinare il piacere della scrittura a qualcosa di estremamente innovativo, una voce legata alla parte più giovane della popolazione e con caratteristiche tali da suscitare interesse soprattutto tra gli studenti.

L'importanza di un'informazione libera e autentica

Tenersi aggiornati su ciò che accade nel nostro paese e nel mondo è di estrema importanza per maturare e comprendere la realtà in cui viviamo, ma ancora più importante è farlo con entusiasmo e coscienza. Creando noi stessi le notizie, informandoci e facendo ricerche in modo indipendente, offriamo un'informazione pulita, non viziata da interessi secondi.

Il sito ad oggi conta 16 autori, tutti studenti che scrivono delle loro passioni e di ciò che accade nel mondo.  

Ecco i nostro obiettivi

1) Stipendiare gli autori

Attualmente tutti i ragazzi della Redazione di Studionews24 sono volontari che contribuiscono quotidianamente alla crescita del sito. Vorremmo ricambiare il loro impegno con un contributo per ogni articolo scritto. Essere stipendiati regolarmente e con una collaborazione di minimo 2 anni permetterà loro di ricevere il tesserino da pubblicista. Andremmo così a creare nuovi posti di lavoro: in Italia al giorno d’oggi trovare un lavoro ben retribuito e a tempo indeterminato è quasi un miraggio. Con il nostro progetto possiamo dare lavoro a tanti giovani in cerca di una prima occupazione, dando loro l’occasione di sperimentare le tecniche del web journalism, imparare a scrivere suWordPress e applicare le tecniche di ottimizzazione SEO.

2) Mantenere le spese per il Server Provider

Mantenere un Server Provider è una spesa ingente, specialmente da quando il progetto ha cominciato a ingrandirsi e a ricevere in media 2000 visite uniche giornaliere.

3) Aprire un ufficio stampa dove poterci riunire

In questo momento le pubblicazioni vengono organizzate a distanza, ci teniamo in contatto tramite i Social ma non sempre è facile gestire tutto il lavoro attraverso un computer. Quindi vorremmo affittare una sede per ospitare la nostra Redazione, dove lavorare in gruppo, discutere tutti insieme e creare un ambiente collaborativo e produttivo.

4) Avere a disposizione attrezzature per le interviste e i servizi fotografici

Ciò di cui noi avremmo bisogno sono una macchina fotografica professionale per poter creare degli scatti unici da inserire all’interno dei nostri articoli. Inoltre abbiamo intenzione di fare delle interviste dal vivo. E per questo abbiamo bisogno anche di una videocamera in qualità HD, di un microfono e delle luci.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A journal of University students

Studionews24 is an independent online information magazine that does not receive public funding. The portal was born in November 2011 from an idea by 5 students at the University of Pisa. Share a passion for journalistic writing, we decided to carry out a project that would combine the pleasure of writing with something very innovative, a magazine related to the younger part of the population, especially students.

Why do we need this budget?

Below is a list of our main reasons:

  • To pay salaries to authors
  • To create new jobs
  • To keep the monthly costs of servers and operating expenses
  • To open a printing office where we can gather

What do you get back for your donation?

  • 1€ =   Good Karma
  • 5€ =   Customized Sn24 logo wallpaper (Resolution: 1920x1080)
  • 10€ = Ebook(ENG-ITA-SPA-FR)+Customized Sn24 logo wallpaper
  • 15€ = Cup with Sn24 logo
  • 20€ = Cover for iPhone 4/4s with Sn24 logo
  • 30€ = Sweatshirt with Sn24 Logo [size: XS,S,M,L,XL]
