story:
The Child Versus The Beast

English Language

Can you imagine being chased from your mother's womb?

Can you imagine being born and having your biological
father force your mother to give you up for adoption?

Can you imagine growing up and realizing that your parents
are not your biological parents and that your
nanny is your real biological mother?


This is a true story based on the moving life of Samuel Beníquez, a young man who, from the moment of his birth, was unjustly condemned and persecuted by an international religious sect, simply for being the product of the love which the global leader of that sect felt for a humble woman, which caused the global leader to ignore the sect's vow of celibacy. After his birth, the child experienced the bitter reality of being denied by his biological father, who denigrated his mother's reputation and forced her to give him up for adoption and then work as the maid in the home of the child's adoptive parents, thus hiding from his parishioners the fact that he was the real father. Within the parish, the boy meets his soul brother, Samuel Ortiz, and growing up, they help each other to escape from the sect, which makes them the object of persecutions, intrigue, death threats, lies, attempted murders and extortion for the rest of their lives. But this does not push them apart or stop them, and in an attempt to put an end to all the oppression, Samuel Ortiz helps Samuel Beníquez to file a paternity suit in court, to prove that the leader of this multinational religious sect was his biological father. This may allow them to put an end to the abuse, persecution and injustice from his father. Following a high profile public, legal, and media battle lasting almost a decade, the case finally reaches the Supreme Court. In the end, Samuel Beníquez prevails through a DNA test which proves that said religious leader was in fact his biological father, vindicating his biological mother and setting a legal precedent in family and adoption cases which will be forever recorded in history. Without doubt, the reader will be shocked to discover that even in the 21st century the power of some religious sects and the people who exercise it shows no mercy towards the victims.

"The greatest form of slavery of our time is that of the captive souls that become victims of dangerous sects." Samuel Beníquez

 

What we need

The book is already written and WILL BE PUBLISHED regardless of the result of this campaign. We are only hoping to raise (at least) $65,000 dollars to help cover the production, translation in two languages and advertising costs (you can see where the money raised will go in the description of the campaign below). Consequently, we are presenting ourselves before our most loyal followers, indeed before everyone who loves children, justice and human rights, to ask for donations and to help spread the word about this book.

What you will get

In exchange for your support, we are offering great deals on the book, commemorative items and a unique opportunity to honor and remember those who have fallen along the way because they were victims of dangerous sects. You will have the satisfaction of being a part of a liberating movement because the greatest slavery of our time is that of the captive souls who fall victim to dangerous sects.

You too can be a liberator of souls!

The profits of the direct sale of this book will go in part to recover the costs of the legal fees that generated this case and the other side will be donated to the nonprofit entity Samuel & Samuel Foundation, Corp.. This foundation is a foundation created by Samuel Ortiz and Samuel Beníquez to help victims of dangerous sects, with education, legal assistance and support.

This is probably not an isolated story. It is highly likely that multiple women and newborn children all over the world have had to face similar problems to the ones that the main characters in this true story had to face as a result of destructive sects. For that reason, you will find more information about what constitutes a dangerous sect below.

What is a sect/cult?

Michael Langone, Ph. D. in Clinical Psychology and the editor of one of the most prestigious scientific magazines that studies the phenomenon of sects defines the concept that we are analyzing in the following way:

"A sect/cult is a group or movement which exhibits an excessive devotion to one person, idea or thing, and which uses unethical manipulation techniques to persuade and control (its followers); designed to achieve the goals of the leader of the group; resulting in the actual or potential consequences of harm to its members, their families and society in general."

Subsequently, Dr. Langone adds that:

"Given that the capacity to exploit other human beings is universal, any group can become a cult. However, the majority of institutionalized and socially accepted organizations have self-regulating mechanisms which restrict the development of sectarian groups". (Langone 1988:1).

How does one recognize brainwashing

Dr. Robert Lifton, Psychiatrist and Sociologist, in his classic work "Thought Reform and the Psychology of Totalitarianism" defined eight criteria that are used to detect if there is "brainwashing" occurring.

  1. Control of the Social Environment and Human Communication. This implies restricting the communication between the human beings that one intends to control, and includes hindering the communion of the individual with himself (for example, preventing one from having free time for personal reflection).
  2. Mystical Manipulation. Purposefully creating "spiritual" atmospheres which appear to be spontaneous but which are actually planned and studied to produce an effect. People interpret this effect as a "spiritual experience" ignoring that they were artificially created situations.
  3. Redefining Language. Controlling words is useful for controlling people's thoughts. One is indoctrinated with simplistic concepts and (for example, clichés which tend to dishearten rather than motivate reasoning "nobody can use their reasoning to reach enlightenment". "Only the chosen ones can understand what happens inside our group").
  4. The Doctrine about the Person. It doesn't matter what a person is experiencing in reality, what is important is the belief in the dogma. The belief of the group surpasses the individual conscience and integrity, in terms with verifying results. An example is when some group claims that God has worked miracles of sanity but refuses to allow scientific verification of the matter. It can even be that a person is seriously ill and they will insist that it doesn't matter what we can see, the sick person is healthy.
  5. The Sacred Science. Doctrine with the scientific and moral absolute. Dogma is unquestionable.
  6. The Cult of Confession. Manipulation of public confession to break personal limits Restrictions or prohibitions of personal privacy. For example, the confession of faults or problems has well defined uses and limitations in both the therapeutic and the ecclesiastical settings. In this case, however, it is abused to denigrate and control people through the information revealed. There is an attempt to erase individuality in order to control the masses.
  7. Unattainable Demands of Purity. Unattainable standard of perfection in order to create guilt and shame in the followers. People are punished and taught how to punish themselves for not reaching the ideal which is unattainable to begin with.
  8. Doing away with Existence. The group decides who has a right to exist and who doesn't. There is no legitimate alternative but to belong to that particular organization. In totalitarian government regimes, this is what justifies the execution of political dissidents.

These mechanisms of influence have well-studied effects, both psychological and physiological, to create states of inhibition of reasoning and high susceptibility to control the behavior of a social group.

Future Perspectives

As the end of this decade approaches, Destructive Cults/Sects will continue to increase, particularly in the religious setting. According to Dr. Hockman this will be the result not only of apocalyptic mystics but particularly due to the breakdown of society in general. (Hockman 179-187).

This implies that the subject of Cults/Sects will become increasingly more relevant. This is shown by the fact that these subjects are taking up more and more space in the media. In light of this, there is a need for reliable methods of analysis to make classifications about what does and what does not constitute a sect.

The criteria have to be as strict as possible and must consider that a group may be classified as a cult from different perspectives. For example: Jehovah's Witnesses are considered a cult/sect from the religious point of view for instilling non-Christian dogmas. At the same time, they are considered a sect sociologically for preventing, using techniques of coercion, blood transfusions for their followers, even minors, and this leads to unnecessary deaths every year and violates the universal human rights of children.

Modern United States is a society which is beginning to demand accountability, and that all institutions show transparency in their ends and means of work. Religious organizations are not exempt from being held accountable just like any other institution.

Speech presented by Professor Jorge Erdely G. at the National School of Anthropology and History.

People like us must raise our voices so that this does not continue to happen anywhere in the world, and this is why it is imperative to publish the book The Child Versus The Beast, to educate and raise awareness within society. Destructive Cults/Sects pose a public health problem because of the social impact that they have. Hockman's definition about what constitutes a cult goes beyond the medical setting to enrich legal ethics. Analyze the phrase: fully informed consent and you will reach the conclusion that the very spirit of this concept is the one that, when violated, gives rise to the typical crime of fraud in our society.

Only through education and by making the world aware of this problem will we reach our goal of having fewer and fewer people fall victim every day to the evil claws of unscrupulous, money-driven and power-hungry individuals.

Just like David against Goliath, each one of you can contribute something to this fight: The Child Versus The Beast. All donations, small or large, will go towards providing education, encouragement and hope, through this book, to millions of people affected by this evil enveloping the world. Let's all get together so that this story can be published and the whole world can know about it. You also carry a defenseless child inside you who can fight against this great evil beast. Let us show what the power of good and unity can do.

Perhaps you are not capable of contributing to this project financially, but that does not mean that you cannot help out. You are useful and can help in the following ways:

  • Spread the word and make some noise about this campaign at your school, university, workplace, and in your neighborhood;
  • Share this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Foursquare, YouTube, WordPress, Tumbler, Blog and Instagram;
  • Talk to your friends about this campaign and contacts in the press and other media outlets in your city and/or country;
  • Remember to use the tools that Indiegogo has to share the information about this campaign.

Join us and become a Superhero freeing souls from modern-day slavery!

What if my question isn't answered here?

We're happy to respond to any other queries you might have about The Child Versus The Beast, the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us at sbm@childvsbeast.com

 

 

Idioma Español

¿Te imaginas ser perseguido desde el vientre
de tu madre?

¿Te imaginas nacer y que tu padre biológico
obligue a tu madre a darte en adopción?

¿Te imaginas crecer y darte cuenta que tus
padres no son tus padres biológicos y que
tu nana es tu verdadera madre biológica?

Esta es una historia verídica basada en la conmovedora vida de Samuel Beníquez. Un joven que desde su nacimiento se ganó injustamente el repudio y la persecución de una secta religiosa internacional, por la única razón de ser producto del amor que sentía el líder mundial de la misma, por una humilde mujer, obviando dicho líder el mandato de celibato de su secta. Luego de su nacimiento, el niño experimenta la amarga realidad de que su padre biológico lo niega como hijo, denigra la reputación de su madre, obliga a ésta a darlo en adopción y la obliga a trabajar de sirvienta en la casa de los padres adoptivos del niño, para ocultar así delante de toda su feligresía que él era el progenitor. Dentro de la feligresía, el niño llega a conocer a su hermano del alma, Samuel Ortiz y al crecer, mutuamente se ayudan a escapar de esa secta y por tal motivo son objeto de persecuciones, intrigas, amenazas de muerte, mentiras, intentos de asesinato y chantaje durante toda su trayectoria de vida. Esto no los separa al uno del otro, ni tampoco los detiene, y para tratar de poner un alto a toda esa opresora situación, Samuel Ortiz ayuda a Samuel Beníquez a radicar en los tribunales un pleito de filiación, para probar que el líder de esa multinacional secta religiosa era su padre biológico; de esta manera lograrían detener el abuso, persecuciones y la injusticia de su padre. Luego de una batalla mediática, pública y legal de casi una década, el caso judicial llega hasta el Tribunal Supremo. Al final, Samuel Beníquez prevalece en la prueba de ADN, logrando así evidenciar que dicho líder religioso era su padre biológico, reivindicando a su madre biológica y sentando así un precedente legal en casos de familia y adopción que quedará para siempre escrito en la historia. Sin duda, el lector quedará impactado al darse cuenta que todavía en el Siglo XXI el poder de algunas sectas y las personas que lo ejercen pueden ser sumamente despiadadas con quien deciden serlo.

"La mayor esclavitud de este tiempo, es la de almas cautivas que son víctimas de sectas peligrosas." Samuel Beníquez

Lo que nosotros necesitamos

El libro ya está escrito y VA A SER PUBLICADO independientemente del resultado de esta campaña, sólo estamos esperando recaudar (al menos) $65,000 dólares para ayudar a cubrir los costos de producción, edición, traducción en dos idiomas y publicidad de ellos (tú podrás ver en detalle a dónde irá el dinero recaudado en la descripción de la campaña, más abajo). Por eso, nos estamos presentando delante de nuestros seguidores más fuertes, y de hecho todos los amantes de los niños, la justicia y los derechos humanos, para pedir contribuciones y ayudar a difundir la palabra acerca de este libro.

Lo que obtendrás

A cambio de tu apoyo, estamos ofreciendo grandes ofertas en el libro, artículos conmemorativos, y una oportunidad única para honrar y/o recordar a aquellos que han quedado postrados en el camino porque han sido víctima de sectas peligrosas. Obtendrás la satisfacción de ser parte de un movimiento liberador, porque en este tiempo la mayor esclavitud mundial es la de las almas que son víctima de ese tipo de sectas destructivas. Aquí poner los "Perks" que se ofrecerán, con ilustraciones.

¡Tú también puedes ser liberador de almas!

Las ganancias de la venta directa de este libro serán destinadas en parte para recuperar los gastos de los honorarios legales que generó este caso, y la otra parte será donada a la entidad sin fines pecuniarios Samuel & Samuel Foundation Corp. Dicha fundación es una fundación creada por Samuel Ortiz y Samuel Beníquez para ayudar a víctimas de sectas peligrosas, con educación, asistencia legal y apoyo.

Tal vez esta historia no es una historia aislada. Posiblemente múltiples mujeres y recién nacidos, alrededor del mundo, han tenido que atravesar por problemas parecidos al que vivieron los personajes principales de esta historia verídica, por causa de sectas destructivas. Por eso, a continuación te ofrecemos más información acerca de lo que es una secta peligrosa.

¿Qué es una secta?

Michael Langone, Ph. D. Doctor en Psicología Clínica y editor de una de las más prestigiadas revistas científicas que estudian el fenómeno de las sectas, define así el concepto que estamos analizando:

"Secta es un grupo o movimiento, que exhibe una devoción excesiva a una persona, idea o cosa y que emplea técnicas antiéticas de manipulación para persuadir y controlar (a sus adeptos); diseñadas para lograr las metas del líder del grupo; trayendo como consecuencias actuales o posibles, el daño a sus miembros, a los familiares de ellos o a la sociedad en general".

Después el Dr. Langone añade que:

"Dado que la capacidad para explotar a otros seres humanos es universal, cualquier grupo puede llegar a convertirse en una secta. Sin embargo, la mayoría de las organizaciones institucionalizadas y socialmente aceptadas, tienen mecanismos de auto-regulación que restringen el desarrollo de grupúsculos sectarios". (Langone 1988:1).

Cómo se reconoce cuando hay un lavado de cerebro

El Dr. Robert Lifton, Psiquiatra y Sociólogo, definió en su obra clásica "La Reforma del Pensamiento y la Psicología del Totalitarismo" ocho criterios para detectar cuando se está implementando el llamado "lavado de cerebro".

  1. Control de la Atmósfera Social y de la Comunicación Humana. Esto implica coartar la comunicación entre los seres humanos que se intenta controlar, e incluye obstaculizar la comunión del individuo consigo mismo [por ejemplo al evitar que tenga tiempo libre para la reflexión personal].
  2. Manipulación Mística.- Construir premeditadamente atmósferas "espirituales" que parecen espontáneas pero que en realidad están planeadas y estudiadas para producir un efecto. La gente interpreta este efecto como una "experiencia espiritual", al ignorar que fueron situaciones fabricadas.
  3. Redefinir el Lenguaje. Controlar las palabras es útil para controlar el pensamiento de las personas. Se adoctrina con conceptos simplistas y (por ejemplo cliches que tienden a desalentar más que alentar el razonamiento "nadie puede utilizar su razón para alcanzar la iluminación". "Sólo los elegidos pueden entender lo que sucede al interior de nuestra agrupación.)
  4. La Doctrina sobre la Persona. No importa lo que una persona esté experimentando en la realidad, es la creencia en el dogma lo que es importante. La creencia del grupo rebasa la conciencia individual y la integridad, en cuanto a comprobar resultados. Un ejemplo es cuando algún grupo proclama que Dios ha realizado milagros de sanidad pero se niega a hacer verificaciones científicas al respecto. Puede ser inclusive que una persona esté gravemente enferma y se asegure que no importa lo que se vea, ya está sana. Es más importante sostener el dogma que el bienestar de las personas y lo que indica la realidad.
  5. La Ciencia Sagrada. Doctrina con el absoluto, científico y moral. El dogma es incuestionable.
  6. El Culto a la Confesión. Manipulación de la confesión pública para romper los límites personales. Restricciones o prohibiciones a la privacía personal. Por ejemplo, la confesión de faltas o problemas tiene usos y limitaciones bien definidas tanto en el ámbito terapéutico como en el eclesiástico. En este caso se abusa del uso, para denigrar y controlar a las personas a través de la información vertida. Se intenta borrar la individualidad para ser controlado en masa.
  7. Demandas de Pureza Inalcanzables. Estándar inalcanzable de perfección para crear culpabilidad y vergüenza en los adeptos. La gente es castigada y enseñada a autocastigarse por no llegar al ideal que de inicio es imposible de alcanzar.
  8. La Dispensación de la Existencia. El grupo decide quién tiene derecho a existir y quién no. No existe ninguna alternativa legítima sino sólo el pertenecer a esa organización en particular. En regímenes gubernamentales totalitarios esto es lo que justifica la ejecución de disidentes políticos.

Los anteriores mecanismos de influencia tienen efectos bien estudiados, tanto Psicológicos como Fisiológicos, para crear estados de inhibición del razonamiento y alta sugestibilidad para controlar la conducta de un grupo social.

Perspectivas a Futuro

Conforme se acerca el fin de esta década, las Sectas/cultos destructivos irán en aumento, especialmente las de corte religioso. Según el Dr. Hockman esto será consecuencia no sólo de misticismos apocalípticos sino especialmente por el deterioro de la sociedad en general. (Hockman 179-187).

Esto implica que el tema de las sectas/cultos tomará cada vez más relevancia. Así lo evidencia en el mundo el hecho de que estos temas ocupen cada vez más espacios en los medios de comunicación. En vista de esto, es necesario contar con metodologías confiables de análisis para hacer clasificaciones, acerca de qué constituye o no una secta.

Los criterios deben ser los más rigurosos posibles y se debe tener en cuenta que un grupo puede ser clasificado como secta desde diferentes perspectivas. Por ejemplo: Los Testigos de Jehová son considerados una secta desde el punto de vista teológico por inculcar dogmas no cristianos. Al mismo tiempo son considerados una secta sociológicamente, por impedir con técnicas coercitivas la transfusión de sangre a sus adeptos, incluidos menores de edad, lo cual genera muertes innecesarias cada año y viola los derechos universales de los menores de edad.

El Estados Unidos de hoy es una sociedad que comienza a pedir cuentas y exige que todas las instituciones sean transparentes en sus fines y métodos de trabajo. Las organizaciones religiosas no están exentas de rendir cuentas claras al igual que cualquier otra institución.

Ponencia presentada por el profesor Jorge Erdely G. en la Escuela Nacional de Antropología e Historia.

Es necesario que personas como tú y como nosotros levantemos nuestra voz para que esto no continúe sucediendo en ninguna parte del mundo y por eso es imperioso publicar el libro El Niño Versus La Bestia, para llevar educación y concienciación a la sociedad. Las Sectas Destructivas presentan un problema de salud pública por el impacto social que tienen. La definición de Hockman sobre lo que constituye una secta, trasciende aún el ámbito médico, para enriquecer la ética jurídica. Analícese la frase: consentimiento con pleno conocimiento y se llegará a la conclusión de que el espíritu mismo de este concepto es el que, al ser violado, da lugar a la tipificación del delito de fraude en nuestra sociedad.

Solo con educación y exponiendo este problema ante el mundo entero lograremos nuestro objetivo de que cada día menos gente inocente caigan en las garras de personas sin escrúpulos, con intenciones de lucro y de tener poder totalitario sobre las almas cautivas.

Al igual que David contra Goliat, cada uno de ustedes puede aportar algo a esta lucha de El Niño Versus La Bestia. Todas las donaciones, grandes o pequeñas, serán para brindar educación, aliento y esperanza, a través de este libro, a millones de personas afectadas por este mal que está arropando al mundo. Vamos a unirnos todos para que esta historia pueda ser publicada y que el mundo entero la conozca. En tu interior tú también llevas a un niño indefenso que puede luchar contra esa gran bestia que es el mal. Mostremos lo que el poder del bien y de la unión puede lograr.

Tal vez seas una persona que no puedes contribuir a este proyecto financieramente, pero eso no quiere decir que no puedes ayudar. Tú eres un ser útil y puedes ayudar de las siguientes maneras:

  • Corre la voz y haz algo de ruido acerca de esta campaña en tu escuela, universidad, trabajo y vecindario;
  • Comparte esta campaña en tu Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Foursquare, YouTube, WordPress, Tumbler, Blog y Instagram;
  • Habla de esta campaña con tus amigos y contactos de la prensa y medios de comunicación de tu ciudad y/o país;
  • Recuerda utilizar las herramientas que tiene Indiegogo para compartir la información de esta campaña.

¡Únete a nosotros y sé un Súper Héroe liberando almas de la esclavitud moderna!

¿Qué pasa si mi pregunta no está respondida aquí?

Nos complacerá responder a cualquier tipo de duda que usted pueda tener sobre El Niño Versus La Bestia, la campaña Indiegogo, y nuestra empresa en su totalidad. Envíanos un email a sbm@childvsbeast.com

The Child Versus The Beast

English Language

Can you imagine being chased from your mother's womb?
Can you imagine being born and having your biological father force your mother to give you up for adoption?
Can you imagine growing up and realizing that your parents are not your biological parents and that your nanny is your real biological mother?




This is a true story based on the moving life of Samuel Beníquez, a young man who, from the moment of his birth, was unjustly condemned and persecuted by an international religious sect, simply for being the product of the love which the global leader of that sect felt for a humble woman, which caused the global leader to ignore the sect's vow of celibacy. After his birth, the child experienced the bitter reality of being denied by his biological father, who denigrated his mother's reputation and forced her to give him up for adoption and then work as the maid in the home of the child's adoptive parents, thus hiding from his parishioners the fact that he was the real father. Within the parish, the boy meets his soul brother, Samuel Ortiz, and growing up, they help each other to escape from the sect, which makes them the object of persecutions, intrigue, death threats, lies, attempted murders and extortion for the rest of their lives. But this does not push them apart or stop them, and in an attempt to put an end to all the oppression, Samuel Ortiz helps Samuel Beníquez to file a paternity suit in court, to prove that the leader of this multinational religious sect was his biological father. This may allow them to put an end to the abuse, persecution and injustice from his father. Following a high profile public, legal, and media battle lasting almost a decade, the case finally reaches the Supreme Court. In the end, Samuel Beníquez prevails through a DNA test which proves that said religious leader was in fact his biological father, vindicating his biological mother and setting a legal precedent in family and adoption cases which will be forever recorded in history. Without doubt, the reader will be shocked to discover that even in the 21st century the power of some religious sects and the people who exercise it shows no mercy towards the victims. 
"The greatest form of slavery of our time is that of the captive souls that become victims of dangerous sects." Samuel Beníquez
 




What we need
The book is already written and WILL BE PUBLISHED regardless of the result of this campaign. We are only hoping to raise (at least) $65,000 dollars to help cover the production, translation in two languages and advertising costs (you can see where the money raised will go in the description of the campaign below). Consequently, we are presenting ourselves before our most loyal followers, indeed before everyone who loves children, justice and human rights, to ask for donations and to help spread the word about this book. 
What you will get
In exchange for your support, we are offering great deals on the book, commemorative items and a unique opportunity to honor and remember those who have fallen along the way because they were victims of dangerous sects. You will have the satisfaction of being a part of a liberating movement because the greatest slavery of our time is that of the captive souls who fall victim to dangerous sects.
 
You too can be a liberator of souls!




The profits of the direct sale of this book will go in part to recover the costs of the legal fees that generated this case and the other side will be donated to the nonprofit entity Samuel & Samuel Foundation, Corp.. This foundation is a foundation created by Samuel Ortiz and Samuel Beníquez to help victims of dangerous sects, with education, legal assistance and support.


This is probably not an isolated story. It is highly likely that multiple women and newborn children all over the world have had to face similar problems to the ones that the main characters in this true story had to face as a result of destructive sects. For that reason, you will find more information about what constitutes a dangerous sect below. 

What is a sect/cult?
Michael Langone, Ph. D. in Clinical Psychology and the editor of one of the most prestigious scientific magazines that studies the phenomenon of sects defines the concept that we are analyzing in the following way:
"A sect/cult is a group or movement which exhibits an excessive devotion to one person, idea or thing, and which uses unethical manipulation techniques to persuade and control (its followers); designed to achieve the goals of the leader of the group; resulting in the actual or potential consequences of harm to its members, their families and society in general."
Subsequently, Dr. Langone adds that:
"Given that the capacity to exploit other human beings is universal, any group can become a cult. However, the majority of institutionalized and socially accepted organizations have self-regulating mechanisms which restrict the development of sectarian groups". (Langone 1988:1).
How does one recognize brainwashing
Dr. Robert Lifton, Psychiatrist and Sociologist, in his classic work "Thought Reform and the Psychology of Totalitarianism" defined eight criteria that are used to detect if there is "brainwashing" occurring.


Control of the Social Environment and Human Communication. This implies restricting the communication between the human beings that one intends to control, and includes hindering the communion of the individual with himself (for example, preventing one from having free time for personal reflection).

Mystical Manipulation. Purposefully creating "spiritual" atmospheres which appear to be spontaneous but which are actually planned and studied to produce an effect. People interpret this effect as a "spiritual experience" ignoring that they were artificially created situations.

Redefining Language. Controlling words is useful for controlling people's thoughts. One is indoctrinated with simplistic concepts and (for example, clichés which tend to dishearten rather than motivate reasoning "nobody can use their reasoning to reach enlightenment". "Only the chosen ones can understand what happens inside our group").

The Doctrine about the Person. It doesn't matter what a person is experiencing in reality, what is important is the belief in the dogma. The belief of the group surpasses the individual conscience and integrity, in terms with verifying results. An example is when some group claims that God has worked miracles of sanity but refuses to allow scientific verification of the matter. It can even be that a person is seriously ill and they will insist that it doesn't matter what we can see, the sick person is healthy.

The Sacred Science. Doctrine with the scientific and moral absolute. Dogma is unquestionable.

The Cult of Confession. Manipulation of public confession to break personal limits Restrictions or prohibitions of personal privacy. For example, the confession of faults or problems has well defined uses and limitations in both the therapeutic and the ecclesiastical settings. In this case, however, it is abused to denigrate and control people through the information revealed. There is an attempt to erase individuality in order to control the masses.

Unattainable Demands of Purity. Unattainable standard of perfection in order to create guilt and shame in the followers. People are punished and taught how to punish themselves for not reaching the ideal which is unattainable to begin with.

Doing away with Existence. The group decides who has a right to exist and who doesn't. There is no legitimate alternative but to belong to that particular organization. In totalitarian government regimes, this is what justifies the execution of political dissidents.

These mechanisms of influence have well-studied effects, both psychological and physiological, to create states of inhibition of reasoning and high susceptibility to control the behavior of a social group.
Future Perspectives
As the end of this decade approaches, Destructive Cults/Sects will continue to increase, particularly in the religious setting. According to Dr. Hockman this will be the result not only of apocalyptic mystics but particularly due to the breakdown of society in general.  (Hockman 179-187).
This implies that the subject of Cults/Sects will become increasingly more relevant. This is shown by the fact that these subjects are taking up more and more space in the media. In light of this, there is a need for reliable methods of analysis to make classifications about what does and what does not constitute a sect.
The criteria have to be as strict as possible and must consider that a group may be classified as a cult from different perspectives. For example: Jehovah's Witnesses are considered a cult/sect from the religious point of view for instilling non-Christian dogmas. At the same time, they are considered a sect sociologically for preventing, using techniques of coercion, blood transfusions for their followers, even minors, and this leads to unnecessary deaths every year and violates the universal human rights of children.
Modern United States is a society which is beginning to demand accountability, and that all institutions show transparency in their ends and means of work. Religious organizations are not exempt from being held accountable just like any other institution.
Speech presented by Professor Jorge Erdely G. at the National School of Anthropology and History.


People like us must raise our voices so that this does not continue to happen anywhere in the world, and this is why it is imperative to publish the book The Child Versus The Beast, to educate and raise awareness within society. Destructive Cults/Sects pose a public health problem because of the social impact that they have. Hockman's definition about what constitutes a cult goes beyond the medical setting to enrich legal ethics. Analyze the phrase: fully informed consent and you will reach the conclusion that the very spirit of this concept is the one that, when violated, gives rise to the typical crime of fraud in our society.
Only through education and by making the world aware of this problem will we reach our goal of having fewer and fewer people fall victim every day to the evil claws of unscrupulous, money-driven and power-hungry individuals.

Just like David against Goliath, each one of you can contribute something to this fight: The Child Versus The Beast. All donations, small or large, will go towards providing education, encouragement and hope, through this book, to millions of people affected by this evil enveloping the world. Let's all get together so that this story can be published and the whole world can know about it. You also carry a defenseless child inside you who can fight against this great evil beast. Let us show what the power of good and unity can do.

Perhaps you are not capable of contributing to this project financially, but that does not mean that you cannot help out. You are useful and can help in the following ways:

Spread the word and make some noise about this campaign at your school, university, workplace, and in your neighborhood;
Share this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Foursquare, YouTube, WordPress, Tumbler, Blog and Instagram;
Talk to your friends about this campaign and contacts in the press and other media outlets in your city and/or country;
Remember to use the tools that Indiegogo has to share the information about this campaign.

Join us and become a Superhero freeing souls from modern-day slavery!
What if my question isn't answered here?
We're happy to respond to any other queries you might have about The Child Versus The Beast, the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us at sbm@childvsbeast.com

¿Te imaginas ser perseguido desde el vientre de tu madre? 
¿Te imaginas nacer y que tu padre biológico obligue a tu madre a darte en adopción?
¿Te imaginas crecer y darte cuenta que tus padres no son tus padres biológicos y que tu nana es tu verdadera madre biológica?



Esta es una historia verídica basada en la conmovedora vida de Samuel Beníquez. Un joven que desde su nacimiento se ganó injustamente el repudio y la persecución de una secta religiosa internacional, por la única razón de ser producto del amor que sentía el líder mundial de la misma, por una humilde mujer, obviando dicho líder el mandato de celibato de su secta. Luego de su nacimiento, el niño experimenta la amarga realidad de que su padre biológico lo niega como hijo, denigra la reputación de su madre, obliga a ésta a darlo en adopción y la obliga a trabajar de sirvienta en la casa de los padres adoptivos del niño, para ocultar así delante de toda su feligresía que él era el progenitor. Dentro de la feligresía, el niño llega a conocer a su hermano del alma, Samuel Ortiz y al crecer, mutuamente se ayudan a escapar de esa secta y por tal motivo son objeto de persecuciones, intrigas, amenazas de muerte, mentiras, intentos de asesinato y chantaje durante toda su trayectoria de vida. Esto no los separa al uno del otro, ni tampoco los detiene, y para tratar de poner un alto a toda esa opresora situación, Samuel Ortiz ayuda a Samuel Beníquez a radicar en los tribunales un pleito de filiación, para probar que el líder de esa multinacional secta religiosa era su padre biológico; de esta manera lograrían detener el abuso, persecuciones y la injusticia de su padre. Luego de una batalla mediática, pública y legal de casi una década, el caso judicial llega hasta el Tribunal Supremo. Al final, Samuel Beníquez prevalece en la prueba de ADN, logrando así evidenciar que dicho líder religioso era su padre biológico, reivindicando a su madre biológica y sentando así un precedente legal en casos de familia y adopción que quedará para siempre escrito en la historia. Sin duda, el lector quedará impactado al darse cuenta que todavía en el Siglo XXI el poder de algunas sectas y las personas que lo ejercen pueden ser sumamente despiadadas con quien deciden serlo.
 "La mayor esclavitud de este tiempo, es la de almas cautivas que son víctimas de sectas peligrosas." Samuel Beníquez





Lo que nosotros necesitamos 
El libro ya está escrito y VA A SER PUBLICADO independientemente del resultado de esta campaña, sólo estamos esperando recaudar (al menos) $65,000 dólares para ayudar a cubrir los costos de producción, edición, traducción en dos idiomas y publicidad de ellos (tú podrás ver en detalle a dónde irá el dinero recaudado en la descripción de la campaña, más abajo). Por eso, nos estamos presentando delante de nuestros seguidores más fuertes, y de hecho todos los amantes de los niños, la justicia y los derechos humanos, para pedir contribuciones y ayudar a difundir la palabra acerca de este libro. 
  
Lo que obtendrás
A cambio de tu apoyo, estamos ofreciendo grandes ofertas en el libro, artículos conmemorativos, y una oportunidad única para honrar y/o recordar a aquellos que han quedado postrados en el camino porque han sido víctima de sectas peligrosas. Obtendrás la satisfacción de ser parte de un movimiento liberador, porque en este tiempo la mayor esclavitud mundial es la de las almas que son víctima de ese tipo de sectas destructivas.
    Aquí poner los "Perks" que se ofrecerán, con ilustraciones.
  
¡Tú también puedes ser liberador de almas!

Por ejemplo: Los Testigos de Jehová son considerados una secta desde el punto de vista teológico por inculcar dogmas no cristianos. Al mismo tiempo son considerados una secta sociológicamente, por impedir con técnicas coercitivas la transfusión de sangre a sus adeptos, incluidos menores de edad, lo cual genera muertes innecesarias cada año y viola los derechos universales de los menores de edad. 
El Estados Unidos de hoy es una sociedad que comienza a pedir cuentas y exige que todas las instituciones sean transparentes en sus fines y métodos de trabajo. Las organizaciones religiosas no están exentas de rendir cuentas claras al igual que cualquier otra institución.
Ponencia presentada por el profesor Jorge Erdely G. en la Escuela Nacional de Antropología e Historia.




Es necesario que personas como tú y como nosotros levantemos nuestra voz para que esto no continúe sucediendo en ninguna parte del mundo y por eso es imperioso publicar el libro El Niño Versus La Bestia, para llevar educación y concienciación a la sociedad. Las Sectas Destructivas presentan un problema de salud pública por el impacto social que tienen. La definición de Hockman sobre lo que constituye una secta, trasciende aún el ámbito médico, para enriquecer la ética jurídica. Analícese la frase: consentimiento con pleno conocimiento y se llegará a la conclusión de que el espíritu mismo de este concepto es el que, al ser violado, da lugar a la tipificación del delito de fraude en nuestra sociedad.
Solo con educación y exponiendo este problema ante el mundo entero lograremos nuestro objetivo de que cada día menos gente inocente caigan en las garras de personas sin escrúpulos, con intenciones de lucro y de tener poder totalitario sobre las almas cautivas.



Al igual que David contra Goliat, cada uno de ustedes puede aportar algo a esta lucha de El Niño Versus La Bestia. Todas las donaciones, grandes o pequeñas, serán para brindar educación, aliento y esperanza, a través de este libro, a millones de personas afectadas por este mal que está arropando al mundo. Vamos a unirnos todos para que esta historia pueda ser publicada y que el mundo entero la conozca. En tu interior tú también llevas a un niño indefenso que puede luchar contra esa gran bestia que es el mal. Mostremos lo que el poder del bien y de la unión puede lograr. 



Tal vez seas una persona que no puedes contribuir a este proyecto financieramente, pero eso no quiere decir que no puedes ayudar. Tú eres un ser útil y puedes ayudar de las siguientes maneras:

Corre la voz y haz algo de ruido acerca de esta campaña en tu escuela, universidad, trabajo y vecindario;
Comparte esta campaña en tu Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Foursquare, YouTube, WordPress, Tumbler, Blog y Instagram;
Habla de esta campaña con tus amigos y contactos de la prensa y medios de comunicación de tu ciudad y/o país;
Recuerda utilizar las herramientas que tiene Indiegogo para compartir la información de esta campaña.

 ¡Únete a nosotros y sé un Súper Héroe liberando almas de la esclavitud moderna! 


¿Qué pasa si mi pregunta no está respondida aquí?
Nos complacerá responder a cualquier tipo de duda que usted pueda tener sobre El Niño Versus La Bestia, la campaña Indiegogo, y nuestra empresa en su totalidad. Envíanos un email a sbm@childvsbeast.com

story:
Summary

My name is Jimmie Ward.  I have been a screenplay writer/filmmaker for 7 years.  This is my first attempt at a children's book. My son was the motivation for this book.   
"Dads Do It To/Baby Boy" is the first book in the "Dads Do It Too" series, which follows the birth of my son and all the unforeseen funny things that happen to dads when raising their children.    
By helping me fund the printing production for my book, I will be able to produce the book, which I hope will become a children's classic for generations to come.  
The book will be available in English, Spanish, and French.
What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $10,500, all going towards print production for the book, and to get book 2 of the series started.  If I don't reach my goal, I will still use all the funds for whatever print production I can do.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, please provide me with an email address so I can notify you when the book is complete and you can help get the word out.

story:
**Please do not forget to check the UPDATES tab for current news on this project!**

The Back Story

My name is Brent Millis. I'm an independent author and editor with a penchant for science fiction/cyberpunk and grindhouse-style theater. I am a child of the 80s, so I have an inexplicable love for those years, especially its movies, music, fiction, comics, and boom chica-chica bwow-wow boom adult movies.

Of course, the 80s wouldn't be the 80s without all the great sexy pinup girls of the B-movie 50s and 60s. I spent weekend afternoons mesmerized by old sci-fi flicks on TV and nights engrossed in thoughts of all the curious things aliens/monsters might do to the heroines if they had had just five minutes longer with them alone before the hero appeared on-scene.

At university, I started reading Heavy Metal Magazine and enjoying 90s anime like Ghost in the Shell, Ninja Scroll, MD Geist, MegaZone 23, Macross and Urotsudouji. Masamune Shirow and Toshio Maeda successfully combined science fiction/cyberpunk and adult themes. More recently, the pleasure of living in Japan for over the past decade has introduced me to anime/manga gems like Redline, BLAME!, Bio Mega, Dorohedoro and other titles which have also been very influential.

A couple years ago, when social networking became big, I started publishing my own fiction. "Media Whores" was my first title. It garnered interested across the Internet and captured the attentions of folks like Warren Ellis and Annalee Newitz. I followed it up with "de Sade Assassins" and Bukkake Brawl -- two x-rated titles that sell well every month in Amazon's Kindle store.

While working as the editor on a charity anthology (see Who is Brent Millis (the publisher)?), I created strong relationship with more than 70 authors in various parts of the world. When we were finished, many of those same good folks expressed interested in working with me on other projects. I received invitations to write for various projects and was asked to head up a second charity anthology of the same nature. While (as of this date) I am not currently working on a second charity anthology, a strong interest in editing did take hold in me -- FMO, a tri-annual fiction e-magazine heavily steeped in strong adult themes and hyperviolence (of the action movie/grindhouse type).

I need your help however. It's not easy to publish, even electronically. The cost of doing things right is measured in start-up cash. It's unavoidable. I could do it for free, but it would take much longer to interest authors into submitting, and the quality would just not be the same.

What is FMO?

A tri-annual (three issues a year) fiction e-magazine heavily steeped in strong adult themes. Every issue will feature three to five ORIGINAL stories by various authors from around the world. While the magazine will be in English primarily, it is also my ambition to include non-English work alongside its English translation (with work done by experienced/professional translators).


Who is Brent Millis (the publisher)?

Brent Millis is better known (perhaps) as Made in DNA, author of Bukkake Brawl, "de Sade Assassins", "Media Whores" and other x-rated fiction.

He is also the editor and publisher of Kizuna: Fiction for Japan, a mixed-genre fiction charity anthology that benefits the orphans of the Tohoku disaster (earthquake/tsunami/nuclear power plant) on March 11, 2011. (A title that is not adult in nature.)

Living in Japan for over a decade, the disaster that struck his adopted home was a like any other he has ever experienced. Imploring to his fellow authors, he successfully created the Kizuna project and brought together 75 authors from 11 different countries in a book like none other. Boasting the talent of Michael Moorcock, John Shirley, Jon Courtenay Grimwood, Ken Asamatsu, Joseph Pulver, Sr, Glynn Barrass, Trent Zelazny and many others. Please see this link for complete information and a listing of all the authors.

So there is experience and accomplishment behind the name.

What is the current state of the project?

While the fundraising phase started in late October, I have been working hard to solicit submissions from authors and cover artists for well over a month. I've received a great amount of positive feedback, and currently have received, reviewed and accepted three stories for the premiere issue:

"Espionage Girls" by Glynn Barrass
"The Wasters" by John Trevillian
"C-S" by Elizabeth Black
To be announced by DL Warner

There are other authors who are currently in the process of working on titles for the first three titles, but I cannot yet give their names. I will not promise work until the work is FINISHED. This is commitment to a proper business model.


The Impact

When the goal is reached, the issues will be published over the year 2012, which in turn will give me the power to publish more issues as the work sells. Thus the ultimate goal is to create a viable, continuous publication that will excite readers for many years to come.


For some reason, should the goal not be met, the available funds will be used to create fewer issues, yet I will continue to work toward the same goal of a continuing tri-annual body of work that features various authors (and cover artists). This is a not a goal I am willing to let die. I am simply asking folks for a bit of help in getting set up. In return, you will get perks.


What We Need & What You Get

So where does the money go? Every cent of your contribution will cover the first three issues, which breaks down into the following:

$1000 > Cover/image/mascot/wallpaper art from artists like Miko Peru (whose rough sketch art is the icon and image of this fundraiser), Hiroki Otsuka (Pirontan) - a professional hentai manga artist with 21 manga volumes under his belt, Toshio Maeda - a master hentai artist, who, as the father of tentacle themes, needs no introduction, and others
$2250 > Fiction. That's an average of $150 for each story x 15.
$250 > PDF and other publishing software.
$1500 > For incidentals I cannot yet comprehend. This is, granted, a buffer, but without it, I believe I may be making the mistake of . IF this money is not needed in-full for the first three issues, it will be put toward future issues and I will offer up a further perk to all parties (which will be announced once the the campaign period is over). Please do not think of this as sneaky greediness, but rather, smart fore-planning.

What do you get? Check out the perks on the right-hand side for a full account. And keep your eye on it in case additional perks are added.

Please consider funding this project, even if it's just with a dollar. You might already be spending more than that on a cup of coffee, which will be gone when you are finished with it. FMO is a product that you will be able to enjoy for years to come.


Other Ways You Can Help

If money is not your thing, the biggest thing you can do to help is spread the word! I'm also always open to accepting donated art, fiction and software. (No blackmarket/copyrighted work please.) This will help bring down costs, and anyone who does so will received perks as well. (To be determined after any such offers are made.)

But the easiest way to help out is to LIKE our page on Facebook, follow the Twitter account, and otherwise spread the word on your homepage or via your favorite blog -- word-of-mouth is, hands down, best way to promote. Please, by all means, share this project URL with as many people as possible.

story:
Joe's Story

Joe moved to Los Angeles 6 years ago with a Nissan full of his stuff and a dream. To make people laugh. Over the years he has written for some web series, his friends who do stand up comedy and even sketch. All that time it was for someone else, never for himself. Now the Strait Jacket society has come calling and has asked Joe to join and be a part of their sketch shows, writing sketches that HE will perform in. Sketches that he will be the owner of! Joe is already hard at work writing new sketches for his first show which should debut sometime in May! To help pay for the theater and everything involved in producing live sketch comedy, every member of SJS is required to pay a one time fee of $250. So Joe could be there for 10 years and write and perform in hundreds of shows and he only has to pay this fee once.  thsi is where you can help make his dream a reality



Donate and help Joe reach his goal!

All Joe needs is $250 dollars! That means if 250 of you donate one dollar, He is there! Everyone donating $1, $5, $10 or $20 will get all the info on when the show is going to happen AND Joe's sincere gratitude. Anyone Donating $50 or more gets a free ticket to one of the shows being performed here in Hollywood, CA. Its up to you how you get here, but if you request a specific Thursday to go see it, Joe will do his best to make sure you get a ticket for that date! And all of you can feel good knowing you helped someone reach the next level of their career! Help Joe spread the laughter, people!



What if Joe gets more than $250?

Joe will donate any money over $250 to the red cross towards helping those affected by the disaster in Japan.

story:
Junot Díaz famously once said, “If you want to make a human being into a monster, deny them, at the cultural level, any reflection of themselves.” It’s with this idea at heart that we need more diverse kid’s books. This book “Moon Patrol” aims to promote the “story of us all,” ensuring that children’s bookshelves contain diverse, non-majority narratives of kids of all different races.

Books are one of the best ways to help us experience something that we’re otherwise not exposed to in our real lives, whether that’s traveling in the distant future, living in a world of magic, or simply (maybe not-so-simply) being part of a different culture. Stories help us get into someone else's shoes and see the world from their perspective, and in some sense it’s the majority that needs diverse books the most.

Title: Moon Patrol starring Space Dude Axis


What is Moon Patrol? A space exploration adventure and humor picture book series for young and early readers, focusing on themes of inclusion and diversity.

Story: Axis travels the galaxy helping the helpless, righting wrongs and solving problems! A race of aliens have altered their DNA to eradicate any diversity or specialty, leaving their world in ruins. With no one too smart or too strong, for example, there is no one to fix the machines, or lift debris out of the road. Axis helps show them the importance of diversity and the value of having different cultures in a society. Using his magical space age guitar, he adds color and variety to the planet and formally Grey Aliens.

What makes this special? With an African-American or ethnic protagonist, Moon Patrol will change the landscape of children's books by offering kids a role model that looks like them. He will subtlety say to kids of color "you can be anything you want to be. You can go anywhere you want to go." Kids of all backgrounds will see a version of the hero archetype rarely shown, that of a proud, confident black lone hero and not the comic relief sidekick so often depicted. Through Axis’ interaction with different planets and alien species, kids will learn tolerance and open mindedness to new cultures and different people. And learn that it can be fun to get know the unknown!

Why would kids and parents want to read it? By using subtle metaphors and focusing on fun and vibrant characters and art as much as the message, kids will want to read the series and want to follow the adventures of Axis without feeling like they are being lectured or talked down to. Parents will also enjoy the stories and appreciate being able to read and share stories with their children that have meaning but are also enjoyable and fun.

If you want to support this campaign, you can donate as little as $5, for which you’ll receive the “perk” of a virtual high five. There are loads of other perks you can purchase with your donation, including a personal thank you, autographed hard copy, a logo t-shirt etc...

How the Money Will be Used

It will be used to cover illustrator salaries, and the production and packaging of special rewards. If we're able to raise additional funds, they will either be used to extend the length of this first book, or to produce additional titles in the series.




Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

And that's all there is to it.

be anything you want to be. You can go anywhere you want to go." Kids of
all backgrounds will see a version of the hero archetype rarely shown, that of
a proud, confident black lone hero and not the comic relief sidekick so often
depicted. Through Axis’ interaction with different planets and alien species,
kids will learn tolerance and open mindedness to new cultures and different
people. And learn that it can be fun to get know the unknown!
Why
would kids and parents want to read it? By using subtle metaphors and focusing
on fun and vibrant characters and art as much as the message, kids will want to
read the series and want to follow the adventures of Axis without feeling like
they are being lectured or talked down to. Parents will also enjoy the stories
and appreciate being able to read and share stories with their children that
have meaning but are also enjoyable and fun.
If
you want to support this campaign, you can donate as little as $5, for which
you’ll receive the “perk” of a virtual high five. There are loads of other
perks you can purchase with your donation, including a personal thank you, autographed
hard copy, a logo t-shirt etc...

How the Money Will be Used 

It will be 
used to cover illustrator salaries, and the production and packaging of special rewards. If we're 
able to raise additional funds, they will either be used to extend the 
length of this first book, or to produce additional titles in the series. 





 Other Ways You Can Help  Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jay Wachs.

I have been called everything from the pied piper of cats to the crazy cat lady which is kind of odd being that I am too hairy to look good in a dress. Cats have been a part of my life since birth and I have volunteered at humane societies in every market I have worked.  I am also a life member of the Doris Day Animal League.

Currently, I have three cats at home. All are rescues. Two came from Austin. One came from Lawrence. His name is Jett and he is incredibly special. We adopted him at the age of 12 and he is a very healthy, active 14 year old now. Lawrencians who have frequented downtown Lawrence seem to recognize Jett as the black cat with the rip in his ear that used to roam the streets of downtown.

Over the past two years, I have heard many stories about the downtown cat and his adventures. I decided to turn these stories and a few from my own vivid imagination into a book for children. The book is designed to do two things: introduce children to the wonderful world of downtown Lawrence Kansas and also help overcome image problems associated with black cats.

After I wrote the book, I was fortunate enough to be introduced to Samantha Nowak who is an amazing illustrator. She has brought Jett and his story to life on these pages.

Our goal now is to take our finished product and have it printed so that the children of Lawrence can experience the joy of Jett. A portion of our net proceeds will be donated to the Lawrence Humane Society who works tirelessly every day to be a no-kill shelter...or as close as they can to achieving that goal.


What We Need and What You Get

We are seeking $5,000 to cover the cost of publishing the book online and printing a small run of soft cover paper copies for sale.

For $10, you will receive a copy of the book itself.

For $25, you will receive a copy of the book and a Jett B. Catt coffee mug.

For $50, you will receive a copy of the book, the coffee mug and a 2015 Jett B Catt calendar.

For $100, you will receive an autographed copy of the book and an animated appearance as yourself in the sequel "Jett B Catt Returns To Downtown Lawrence"

Funds will go to online publishing first followed by print publication. The total amount raised determines how many total copies we will publish. Weaver's Department Store and The Raven Book Store have already committed to offering the book for retail sale upon completion.


The Impact

It can be argued that the earlier a child is exposed to books, the stronger and more positive the impact. My goal is to introduce 3 to 8 year old children to Downtown Lawrence and its history. Downtown Lawrence is the backbone of our Lawrence community with tremendous historic treasures dating all the way back to the formation of our city.

As an ambassador of Lawrence, Jett B Catt demonstrates that everyone is welcome in Lawrence regardless of the beliefs, persuasions or appearances.

I believe that this book will resonate with parents and children alike and will also serve to portray our city in the most positive of lights. 

Risks & Challenges

A first attempt at anything is a risk. I have no idea how this book will be received. It was conceived in love for Jett and also for Lawrence. The risk is that it will not sell. That is always the risk.

My plan to solve this problem is to launch an online marketing campaign using social media to promote the book and also air audio and video commercials on LawrenceHits.com, VoiceofLawrence.com and LawrenceTV.tv. All of the media promotion for this project has been donated by The BriarCliff Group, which is the parent company of the online media outlets. The owner and Jett are close personal friends.


Other Ways You Can Help

Share the link to this campaign, tell your friends about us and support the humane society that serves your immediate location.

story:
Poem by Uma Dwivedi and photography by Jon Bassett in our first issue

What we’re about

We understand that we as people are capable of more than one passion. So we've made sure this magazine packs in all sorts, from fiction to photography,  recipes to interviews with bands, politicians and activists.

Work featured in issue one by Lukasz Wierzbowski and Julie Van Wezemael

When SOMEDAY magazine was in its embryonic phase, I remember thinking what if a magazine could help me grow into a braver, more courageous version of myself with my art form. What if it could help me connect to a global group of artists, writers and people who were affecting change through their pages? That is what this magazine is at its core: we are creating a little world where people can go to find community and inspiration.  

Our first issue- cover photo by Anna Malguina - alongside poem by Kayla Hollatz 

What we’ve done

In August 2014 we set out to connect with writers, photographers, artists and inspirational individuals who would fill the pages of our first issue. Along the way we set up a website that showcases selected features from our team, both from the current issue and from online exclusives. We also finished designing our self-titled first issue, 152 pages of quality and creativity that is ready to go to print once we raise the funds.

We now have over 60 people signed up who are either already involved or soon to be involved in future issues and 7+ independent shops committed to selling our magazine. These people make up our global SOMEDAY community. Another part of this network is all those connecting with us on social media, primarily through Instagram, Twitter & Facebook. The response that we’ve received has been super encouraging and has shown that there really is a market for this type of community-driven magazine.

Artist profile spread from our new issue

What we’ll do

SOMEDAY magazine will be released quarterly. That means every three months we will unleash an issue that is a jumble of goodness, with a new theme, new poems, short stories, opinion pieces, art, photography and interviews with bands, politicians, writers, activists, and artists ... and more! We will continue to keep community at SOMEDAY's core. 

Article by and about Oxford, MS, based band The Red Thangs

What the money is for

Printing & shipping: £3282

Branding & design: £200

Rewards & shipping: £300

Launch event: £210  

Any funds raised over the target amount will be used to further secure the magazine's future and help produce upcoming issues.

As we aspire to be a collective of creatives, we have decided that all profits made will be equally divided among those who contributed to that issue. That means that those involved are generously giving their time and talents without knowing how much payment they may receive. The fact that we already have a beautiful first issue full of people who have been happy to do so is testament to the exciting future that awaits.

If this project sounds like something you can get on board with (even if you aren't able to contribute financially), please go make some noise - share this campaign on social media so we can get the word out!

story:
Short Summary

Magdalena Väpnargård

Journalist, programledare i radio och på tv, musikälskare.

Det började med en bok som måste skrivas och som nästan skrev sig själv. Landskap utan karta handlar om hur det var att bli övergiven som 5-åring och om att växa upp med svårt psykiskt sjuka och frireligiösa farföräldrar. Om övergrepp i en idyll som ur en saga av Astrid Lindgren.  Andra delen; Äggskal handlar om en tonårstid mitt under punken men där de vuxna i sitt eget självförverkligande svek och livet var oförutsägbart och förtvivlat. Men även fyllt av möten med kända musiker, galna konstnärssjälar och stora hjärtan.

Tredje delen ; Ryggradens kurva, om saker så svåra och märkliga att man ibland inte kan förstå att de hänt en själv, om felval och vägar som aldrig borde beträtts. Om varför man som 20-åring inte bör starta en rockklubb med artister som The Cult och Attentat som affischnamn.Om varför en kärlekslös barndom kan läkas av egna barn, men aldrig helt. Och hur man kan gå vidare där det inte ens finns en stig att följa, bara mörker och snår. 

Tillsammans blir dessa tre böcker en helhet som känns lika angelägen som tidlös.

Inte en självhjälpsbok, snarare en "du är aldrig ensam-bok".

Den där rockklubben 1984 blev tyvärr början på ett liv med krossad ekonomi, så nu behövs pengar för att kunna trycka böckerna, kunna betala den fantastiska illustratören Annika Lundholm Moberg, och till distribution och marknadsföring.


What We Need & What You Get

  • Tryckkostnader och marknadsföring/distribution kommer kosta i runda slängar 200 000 sek. Släkt och vänner har erbjudit sig att gå in med ytterligare pengar (c:a 50 000 sek) som hela projektet kommer att kosta innan det är i hamn.
  • Illustratör och omkostnader ytterligare c:a 50 000 sek
  • Som musikjournalist och radiopersonlighet har jag historier att berätta och jag väjer inte för det självutlämnande och tunga. Och det ÄR tungt, så tungt att min egen mor bröt kontakten och blockade mig på Facebook redan innan den första  boken ens var färdigskriven.
  • OM inte målet uppnås kommer pengarna oavkortat gå till att finansiera åtminstone den första bokens tryckning och spridning.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Det är en bok som kan hjälpa många med trasig bakgrund. Att läsa om hur andra haft det, även när det gäller tabubelagda ämnen som att bli bortvald av sin familj och utsatt för övergrepp, kan avdramatisera för alla de som inte vågar berätta.
  • Som varande fattig som en lus men att brinna för detta projekt, hoppas jag att du som ser detta ska bli tillräckligt nyfiken för att våga satsa på mig.
  • Just nu skriver jag även på den första i en serie deckare som utspelar sig på Österlen och Skåne. 

Risks & Challenges


  • Det som jag personligen tycker känns svårast i detta projekt är att balansera mellan hänsynstagande mot ännu levande släktingar och att vara sann mot mig själv. Det liv som blev mitt är något som ofta möts med; Men Du måste ju bara skriva en bok. 
  • En av dem är klar, den första, med ER hjälp kan även de andra två bli verklighet.
  • Det finns få som kan hålla en deadline som jag. Många år på tidningar som Nya Wermlandstidningen, Skånska Dagbladet, Kvällsposten, Hennes och många fler, har gjort mig till en formlig kreativ skrivarmaskin. Jag älskar att skriva, och när jag är inne i ett flow tar det ungefär 9 veckor från första ordet till färdigt manus.

Other Ways You Can Help


  • Även om Du inte har ekonomiska möjligheter att stötta detta mitt projekt, finns det andra sätt att hjälpa. Dela min länk på Facebook och andra sociala medier. 
  • ALLT hjälper, 10 sek är lika betydelsefullt som 1000 sek.
  • Indiegogo har utmärkta och enkla verktyg för att dela enkelt. Och Paypal är världens smidigaste och säkra sätt att betala.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Alexander Tate and Kirby Bristow are grudgingly symbiotic college roommates brought together by his girlfriend, who leaves them to deal with apartment payments and each other. They have more than money troubles to worry about, though. Alex is telepathic and suffers from prophetic dreams in a world where the supernatural is unwelcome. Kirby hates it when he pokes around in her thoughts, but she sticks around because he’s agreed to pay all the bills in exchange for her keeping his secret. Things get serious when Alex tells Kirby about a dream he had, one involving a murder on campus. When the dream comes true, they try to harness his “gifts” in the hope of catching the killer.

About the Authors

The authors are Chelsea Clemmons and Chase Rocky. We are both passionate writers who love a good story. We met in a creative writing workshop and instantly clicked. Our ways of thinking were so simpatico that we decided to write a paranormal mystery novel together! If Shattered goes as well as we hope it will, there will very likely be a sequel. Please help us achieve our dream of sharing this novel with the world. 

What We Need & What You Get

What We Need: Coverage of ultimate publishing fees, along with costs of living while completing the novel.

*We accept credit cards and PayPal payments! However, PayPal is our preferred method of receiving funds.*

What You Get: Everyone who contributes or helps us spread the word will receive recognition in the novel's acknowledgements. Those of you who contribute at least $10 will also receive recognition in all our video updates from the start of the campaign through the book's release (Bronze Perk Package). Additionally, those of you who contribute at least $50 will receive a bookmark and postcard from the writers (Silver Perk Package). Those of you who contribute at least $100 will also receive a poster of the book cover (Gold Perk Package). Those of you who contribute at least $500 will also receive a signed paperback copy of the novel (Platinum Perk Package). In addition to the aforementioned items, those of you who contribute at least $1,000 will receive a signed hardback copy of the novel instead of a paperback, and an invite to the book release party (Diamond Perk Package)!

**IMPORTANT NOTICE** All contributions are non-refundable. However, we WILL continue with the project regardless of whether we reach goal or not. The book will be published. Also, we WILL get your chosen perks to you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the word out! Use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word about our project. If you help us get the word out and let us know how you did it, we'll be sure to thank and recognize you in the acknowledgements. We really appreciate any help you can give. 

Thanks,

Chelsea and Chase

story:
About Kelly:

  • I have been writing for many years now. I honestly didn't get a passion for writing until I was in college though. Writing is my passion in my life and I want to do it for the rest of my life!

  • I am holding this campaign to help fund me pursuing my dream of being a published writer.

  • With your help, we all can spread the gift of reading to many people world wide and show that anyone can achieve their dream if they stick with it!

A Sneak Peek:

  • There are links in the gallery to click on and get a sneak peek of BOTH of my finished books!!!

     

What I Need & What You Get:

 

  • I am wanting to spend this money on a new laptop, latest photoshop software (for my covers), new writing and editing software, advertising, better web site (my own domain name and designing), and if I raise a little extra... to take some well needed time off of work so I can concentrate on my writing some more!

    • If goal of $5000.00 is reached--- everyone who donates will also receive a signed Copy of my third book once it is released!

story:
Our Story

A dear friend of mine, Norman Ringel, passed away in May of this year. Before his departure from this world, one of his prime concerns was how his eight year old nephew was going to cope with his death. I personally researched children's books on the subject of loss and found very few options. And so, the story of "Rafa the Robot" was born. I wrote the story while Norman was in the hospital, and although I wanted to get it illustrated and printed within days, I knew that such a deadline was completely unrealistic! So, here I am, three months later, making that wish come true. 


The Impact

My intention is that this book will be a help to parents and or professionals who are dealing with children who have lost a loved one -- whether it be a robot, pet, friend or family member. Death is difficult for adults to navigate and even more so for young children. 

All the funds raised here will go directly to the making of the book (100 copies). If I do not reach my campaign goal then I will cover the outstanding balance myself. The book is going to print even if we don't reach our fund-raising goal!


What We Need & What You Get

I need to pay the talented illustrator Ken Turner (http://kenturnerportfolio.blogspot.com/) for his time and beautiful work. I will also require funds to pay for the printing, shipping and handling costs of the books. Rest assured, you are not buying me dinner or paying my mortgage. Although, that can be arranged if anyone is so inclined!


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word folks and the love of course. Please feel free to pass this on to anyone who might be interested in supporting this book. Why think locally when you can think globally!


I am very grateful for all your support and enthusiasm. Thank you!

story:
My Story

I am a poet trying to share my work with the world through self-publishing. My first collection, Chronicles of the Amazing Broken Girl, was originally published by Sunbury Press in Camp Hill, PA, and is currently out of print. I am going the route of self-publishing in order to save my creative rights and publish my art in the way it's supposed to be viewed by the world. 

I am a manic bipolar woman and my poetry is my therapy. I reach out to anyone that I meet that suffers from, or knows someone that suffers from, any mental illness to let them know that they are not invisible and that they, too, can find a place in the world as I'm doing. 

I have four collections of poetry and prose to print and this is not something that I can afford to do on my own. 

Chronicles of the Amazing Broken Girl tells a story about a woman that uses poetry as healing after she suffers a traumatic heartbreak and a break in the routine that she's created for herself to live with her mental illness. 

Bi-the-Way is a collection of poems that explores darkness, as anyone dealing with illness on a daily basis can relate to. Poetry is used to examine the relationship between the light and the dark and how difficult it can be to find a niche in what can be a very scary outside world. 

Low Fat Love Poems shows the lighter side, as a poet drives for inspiration and finds it in new and interesting places. This is a collection of tributes, to myself and others, as I heal and look for the positive in my surroundings. 

My fourth collection, Rubber Band Ball, is a memoir told in poetry and prose. It tells the story of a girl with a tumultuous upbringing, surrounded by alcoholism, drugs, abuse and mental illness. 


The Impact

10% of all proceeds from book sales are going back into our local art community, with 5% going to York Arts (www.yorkarts.org) and 5% going to The Parliament (www.parliamentyork.org). This doesn't include free books given away by the author as part of the Donate 10 for a Free Book option. 


What We Need & What You Get

All money raised will be used for book publications only. To print 100 copies of a 60-70 page book, the costs are approximately $375.00, with $100 of that used to purchase an ISBN number unique to each book (as required by law) and $275.00 used for printing and shipping. I will be printing one book at a time as I raise money, so every dollar will be used for this. For example, If I meet half of the goal, 2 of the 4 books will be printed and available for sale. 

Books will be sold for $10.00 per book, with discounted rates for multiple book purchases (1 for 10, 2 for 15, 3 for 20 and all 4 for 25). The discounted rates will help the books be promoted both by the author and by other local artists. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help me spread the word about this campaign. I would also be happy to help other artists promote their work and their campaigns to generate more art.
